name: Suffer the Night
description: The envelope is just the beginning. Burn it. Destroy it. Don't play his game. When you see the pale man, it’s already too late. Suffer The Night is a first-person survival horror experience.

name: Piano Star
description: Tap the black tiles! You can easily perform a piano music by yourself. With fun and ease, melody and rhythm of piano songs will flow freely by your fingers.

name: Swirl W@tch
description: Swirl W@​tch is a tense stealth-action roguelite that takes place on an over-exploited gas giant. Infiltrate industrial installations, evade or eliminate guard ships, commit corporate sabotage and grow the movement to unlock new gear. Can your actions free this otherworldly world?

name: Pets Hotel
description: Welcome to Pets Hotel, a place where you can start the business you always dreamed of! Pets Hotel gives you a unique opportunity to build, design, and run a place where pets can feel at home. Cats, dogs, turtles, and many other animals are waiting for you to take proper care of them!

name: WarpVector
description: WarpVector is an immersive sci-fi roguelike built around space exploration, combat, and navigation. Explore the remnants of an ancient civilization, fend off marauding space pirates, and find a way to save your home planet.

name: ArcRunner
description: ArcRunner is a beautiful Cyberpunk-styled action rogue-lite set in the far future on board a huge space station where the controlling AI has gone insane, and its up to you to traverse the Arc to find and destroy it.

name: Recollection
description: A calm and atmospheric "walking'n'watching simulator" about the beauty of nature. Use your gaze and attention in diverse gameplay experiences: Connect the stars, watch the grass grow, fly with the birds and remember many more of the wonders surrounding us each day.

name: Beyond the Long Night
description: Beyond the Long Night is a whimsical and chaotic twin-stick shooting roguelike adventure! Explore The Dark Mountain - a subterranean world full of monsters, secrets and lovable characters. Puzzle, upgrade and battle through three randomly generated areas to outrun a deadly storm and escape to the Overworld beyond. Uncover a trail of mysteries in this ancient kingdom of demigods and explorers, captured within an endless time loop.

name: Doomed Lands
description: Doomed Lands is a survival game where the protagonist must collect, build, mine, face enemies, bosses and survive a doomed land.

name: Mohism
description: Mohism: Battle of Words is a detective game set in the world of wuxia. The game follows Zhang Xiaochen, investigates unsolved cases and comes into his own as a hero. He must rely on his wits and razor-sharp tongue to best his opponents, find the culprit and ensure justice prevails!

name: Picma: Picture Enigmas
description: Picma is a cozy collection of puzzle games where you use your logic skills to reveal hidden pictures. It features more than 100,000 puzzles, created and curated since 2009 by our lovely puzzler community.

name: Boxing Room
description: A boxing game where you must land as many punches on your opponent as possible before he falls to the ground.

name: Danganronpa: Live or Die
description: Follow Megumi and 15 other people locked inside a luxurious mansion. An evil mechanical bear known as Monokuma forces them to play a killing game. Will they start killing each other? Who will survive?

name: GravytX The Gravytoid
description: Play as GravytX an alien who has the ability to control objects remotely and manipulate gravity. Travel the universe to save the peoples who are under the domination of the Vodouas (Malicious beings who want to conquer the universe) and bring peace to their Planets.

name: With the Last Moonbeam
description: Walk, jump, climb, and glide through this platformer adventure as Moss works to mend the Moonheart. Along the way, you'll meet the other inhabitants of Moss's home moon... and perhaps find some secrets too.

name: Paths: Beatrice's Adventure
description: Paths: Beatrice’s Adventure is a choice and consequences game in which the player will get the chance to live and shape Beatrice’s life.

name: A Turtle In A Hare-Machine
description: An erotic horror game.

name: My Gaming Club
description: In the game My Gaming Club you can feel exactly what it's like to own a gaming club, because realism is one of the main features of the game. Assemble PC, buy furniture, food for your club and for your visitors. This game is not just a gaming club simulator, this game is a real life simulator

name: 1-Bit Explorer
description:
1-Bit Explorer is an adventure game focused on exploration where you do NOT save the world and the world does NOT need saving.

The point is to explore to your heart's content and uncover mysteries and secrets (or don't, it's up to you, really).

name: Tailor Tales: James Plus
description: Tailor Tales: James Plus adds a longer epilogue for James. This epilogue is filled with explicit adult content and features the final (10th) CG. You also unlock the ability to skip gold and dress requirements for each chapter.

name: Link! Like! Love Live!
description: Link! Like! Love Live! is the mobile app name of Project Love Live! Hasunosora Girls' High School Idol Club.

name: The Gap
description: The Gap is a short first-person horror experience taking place in a ghostly abandoned house on a lonely street corner.

name: Stigmata of Sacrilege
description: Upon her initiation into the Sisters of Exorcism, Sophie is blessed with a sign from the Lord that she is fated to become the next saint. Now, she must overcome her trials for sainthood and seek blessings from various holy sites.

name: Quadrium
description: Quadrium is a fiddly match-3 game. Clear the board by dropping the tiles off the edges. Various bonuses like boxes, glass, fog, static tiles and portals add variety to the gameplay. Juicy and soft graphics, relaxing music and no time limit allow you to enjoy the innovative gameplay.

name: Dirty Streamer Puzzle
description: Live streaming sometimes turn even the quietest girls into dirty ones!

name: Adventure Puss
description: Adventure Puss is a retro platformer where the player takes on the role of a cat battling rats in their underground complexes. The player must prevent the rats' cunning plans using their dagger and exploring many locations.

name: Number 217721
description: You'd been woken up by an entity which created you. It put you in a testing area and wants you to complete the puzzles and open the end gate. When you open the gate, the test is finished and you complete the task which the entity gave you.

name: Sex Standing
description: Sex Standing is a third-person sci-fi shooter. You play as an android girl. You complete missions from the Delivery Hub. Also in the game there are additional tasks for which you get additional buns/ By completing the main missions, you open the adventure map/

name: Fragment's Note+ AfterStory
description: Following the story of "Fragment's Note+"...

name: Love Live! School Idol Festival 2: Miracle Live!
description: Curtain has been raised once again for the School Idol Festival and strongly aimed by μ’s, Aqours, Nijigasaki School Idol Club, and Liella!

name: Roommates with Benefits
description: Roommates with Benefits is the first book of the Roommates with Benefits series.

name: Scooternia
description: Sin descripción

name: Intersection
description:
Sergeant Yoon Seunghyun is transferred to the 12th District's Central Civil Affairs Department. The young policeman meets an experienced partner, a strong mercenary and a charming hacker. Forming a team, they investigate the murder of a young girl. However, the deeper they dig into the case, the more mysteries emerge.

Immerse yourself in criminal intricacies by choosing one of three ways of plot's development. Solve the case, together with an extraordinary team and uncover the darkest secrets of the alternative world of the Intersection.

name: Beat the Clock
description: Beat The Clock is all about being faster than time itself. Can you get to the hour mark before the clock does? Time, the creator and destroyer of all. No one can beat time right? Well maybe you can.

name: Crosmorf Adventures
description: A platform and adventure game that guarantees a lot of fun. A story about the abomination of society told in a different and interesting way.

name: Canyon Racer
description: Sin descripción

name: Coloring Pixels: Fun and Games Pack
description:
This Fun and Games-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! All images are of toys, games and activities that are fun for all ages!

Rediscover your childhood joy with this book!

name: Endrays
description:
Wield a piercing laser without inhibition at the tip of your fingers - your mouse.
Indulge in Endrays, a devastating weapon of mass destruction, and drive the resistance of humanity into merciless extinction.
What awaits you when this battle comes to an end...?

The second release from the 2022 New Hire Onboarding Program at Bandai Namco Studios!

name: Mega Man Battle Network Legacy Collection Vol. 2: Custom Pet Pack Vol. 2
description: Two rearranged music tracks for the in-game music player and a "Special Skin" that changes the appearance of the 3D MegaMan on the menu screen.

name: Mega Man Battle Network Legacy Collection Vol. 1: Custom Pet Pack Vol. 1
description: Two rearranged music tracks for the in-game music player and a "Special Skin" that changes the appearance of the 3D MegaMan on the menu screen.

name: Cursed Halo Again
description: Cursed Halo is a mod for Halo: Combat Evolved Anniversary that turns the game into a chaotic experience. New Levels, Weapons, Enemy variations, Vehicles, etc.

name: The Witch of Sherdorne Forest
description: The Lord's son has vanished and you decide to venture out in search of the boy.

name: One-armed Cook: Ships and Oceans
description: Are you prepared to set sail on a culinary adventure? Get ready to cook on the open sea, with mouth-watering new meals for the guests.

name: Aces & Adventures: Luck of the Paw
description: Cute cat themed playing card deck cosmetic

name: Pinball FX: Borderlands - Vault Hunter Pinball
description: Welcome, Vault Hunter, to a pinball game of looting and jackpot shooting! Face down fearsome psychos, skags, and bosses as you fight your way across Pandora!

name: Pinball FX: Homeworld - Journey to Hiigara Pinball
description: Inspired by the classic, critically-acclaimed strategy series. Strategize, build up your fleet, and clash in colossal space battles to earn jackpots and the high score!

name: Pinball FX: Brothers in Arms - Win the War Pinball
description: Stick close to your brothers as you liberate towns in the Netherlands during WW2 – armed with a silver ball and your skills.

name: Cool Kid Cody: Season 2 - Episode 02
description: Season 2 Episode 2: Food Feuds! Failing to transform Cody and Peter into Losers on her own, Kitty enlists Juvie's help in pranking the two.

name: Bit Orchard: Animal Valley - Director's Cut
description: Pull out weeds, plant new apple trees and gather the literal fruits of your labour. With time, you'll discover ways to make your life easier and explore this charming 2D world.

name: Doki Doki Dollmaker
description: Doki Doki Dollmaker is an indie boys love visual novel. Make decisions on behalf of Lyle to steer the story in different directions and experience multiple endings.

name: Neko Office: Nightlife Adventures
description: Neko has been working hard at her job in the office and deserves to go to the bar! As you know, it is from the bar that nightly adventures begin...

name: Castle of the Underdogs
description: Find a castle, recruit friends and try to restore the peace in the Bestann Federation while spreading chaos to most places you step on in this comedy JRPG.

name: Drone Master Racing
description: This drone simulator is an exciting experience for up to 5 players to play, perfect for fans of racing and competition.

name: The Witch, Wife, & the Wish
description: Once upon a time, there was a witch who lived in the middle of a forest. Rumors said that even the witch was cursed herself, but the witch had long forgotten what spell had been cast, until one day a brave young man came to ask a favor of the witch, for his ailing wife.

name: Luckie Ball
description: Luckie Ball is a short precision platformer where nothing is fully solid. You'll float to the top of everything! Features tight controls, a custom physics engine, tons of bonus content, and a level editor.

name: AfroPenguin & The Forbidden Ramen
description: "AfroPenguin & The Forbidden Ramen" is a challenging argentinian 2D adventure game which pays homage to those Nintendo titles that made us smile as a kid (and why not, as adults).

name: Mixx Island: Remix Plus
description: Mixx Island Remix Plus is a high-energy, action-packed shooter set in a fantastic 2D world. Gather your wits, sharpen your reflexes, and prepare for the ultimate challenge.

name: Musket & Pike: Great Northern War
description:
At the start of the 18th Century, Sweden was the undisputed power in the Baltic region and a dominant force in Northern Europe. However, the Swedish empire was in the way of the regional ambitions of Russia, Saxony and Denmark – who had several scores to settle with the Swedes.

With the accession of the boy King Charles XII to the Swedish throne in 1700, Russia, Denmark and Saxony saw an opportunity. They formed an alliance and struck at Swedish territories hoping for a swift and decisive victory. However, they had seriously miscalculated the strength of the Swedish military and the resolve of their new monarch and by 1701 all had been defeated. Their attack launched a grueling 21 year war which would drag other countries into the conflict.

The Great Northern War highlighted the military genius of Charles XII and the resilience of the Swedish military who held off defeat for 21 years. It also saw the rise of Tsar Peter I who reformed the Russian military and adapted tactics and strategy to play to Russian strengths which would ultimately defeat an exhausted Sweden.

The Great Northern War includes 69 Scenarios – covering all sizes and situations, including a solo tutorial scenario plus specialized versions for both head to head play and vs. the computer AI. There are also 5 Campaigns included with the game.

name: Round Trip
description: Round Trip is a platform video game where you'll have to keep your balance and be very precise with your movements to complete the challenges present in each level.

name: Woodland Hike
description: Immerse yourself in the serenity of nature with Woodland Hike, a hiking-infused walking simulator that takes you on a journey through lush forests, babbling brooks, and picturesque landscapes.

name: Rewind or Die
description: There's a serial killer stalking your video store, and you just got called into work on your day off! Stock shelves, deal with customers and run for your life!

name: Ultra Pixel Survive
description: In Ultra Pixel Survive you'll find yourself in a pixel world where a young guy named Thomas lives. Today he is going on a journey across the country, and you will be his company. On the screen you will see your character in a certain place. Using the control keys you will guide your hero forward. On his way there will be various traps and dangers that he will have to overcome with your guidance. Sometimes the character may encounter monsters and wild animals, which you can destroy using different weapons from your character's inventory.

name: Memory Land Extreme
description: Welcome to Memory Land Extreme! Can you remember 1000 objects? Do you want to?

name: Sex Gym
description: Sex Gym - is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: Sex Simulator: The Private Jet
description: An interactive sex simulation game with visual novel elements, featuring high-definition graphics and videos with realistic looking characters, set in a beautiful decor. You play the role of a hot businessman, who has sex with three lucky women on the company's private jet.

name: Urban Flow: Prime Edition
description: This bundle includes base game and Streets Supplement with 5 new vehicles to the streets of Urban Flow, each one unique and with its own style.

name: We Will Get revenge
description: We Will Get Revenge is a challenging Roguelite-Shoot'Em Up game with interesting mechanics and physics in which you will have to take revenge on those who destroyed the earth. Battle, upgrade, die, and repeat. Unlock weapons, enemies, missions, mutators, ships and much more with each game.

name: Lost Dream: Darkness
description: Once the Darkness rises above all, It's your time to take the reins and hit the ground running on a mission to discover the light once again.

name: Aery VR: Dreamscape
description: In Aery - Dreamscape you play as a bird like spirit who can enter the minds of other people in order to explore their thoughts, their secrets and their imagination. Experience the feeling of flying, immerse into beautiful and atmospheric landscapes and enjoy the unique storytelling of the game... ​

name: Bit Oz: Wonder Crusher
description: Aim, Shoot, Wall of Worlds.Bit Oz Wonder Crusher is a deck-building action shooting game with roguelike elements. Experience the fun of aiming and shooting!

name: Coin Trader Simulator
description: Coin Trader Simulator is a cryptocurrency trade simulation. Buy low, sell high coins, get experience to level up your skills, sense trends and pump & dump coins. HODL to the moon!

name: BandRoll
description: The platform flows to the rhythm of the music and the player slides. Train your reflexes in a 3D neon universe trying not to fall! You can experience different styles of music with a fluent visuality, and you can open different levels according to your musical tastes.

name: Constantine
description: Indie MMORPG game, Constantine! Do Adventure And be strong! The Constantine is a world that exists inside Nathan's tree. After spring, summer, autumn and winter, the world goes to sleep.

name: Russian Train Trip 2
description: Journey on a passenger train in Russia. You play as a first-person character, you have to travel by train for 7 days to Vladivostok. Look out the window, listen to the radio, and move around the carriage.

name: Mite
description: Mite is a horror game, with few mechanics, in which you play a hiker who has lost his family in a cursed forest in Japan... find your family and escape from the forest, while being chased by strange folklore creatures Japanese.

name: Goblin Dash
description: Goblin Dash plays similarly to other action platformer games, allowing the player to move the goblin character up and down to jump across platforms and defeat enemies. The game challenges the player with difficult abilities and mechanics, and requires skill as a platformer to complete.

name: Fates: Determination
description: Fates Determination is a story driven episodic adult adventure that you play from two perspectives. Once from Jake's point of view and once from Amy's point of view. Be prepared to experience a plot full of drama, mysteries, superpowers and hot sex scenes!

name: Chippy's Escape from Seaberry Keep
description: Bust out of the terrarium, uncover the witch's secrets, make new friends, decorate a mansion, and explore on a great adventure!

name: Inout
description: Inout is a cooperative horror game for 1-4 players. For years, the locals have been afraid of an old mansion in Madyland. A possessed maniac and an ancient evil have settled here. Become a member of a team of exorcists and expel the evil force!

name: Bosorka
description: Bosorka is an exciting action roguelike where a young witch saves the world from insidious and cruel demons. Combine runes, master a variety of brooms, and try all possible and impossible spells until you gain enough power to fight evil.

name: Tinting Time
description: Tinting Time is a Japanese-style crafting game. Play as a creator who can create all kinds of solutions, and spend some leisure time in the city of Folest. The game's creation system that combines crafting and complex resource management gameplay is eye-catching.

name: Airport Ground Handling Simulator VR
description: This is a consumer version of the professional VR training software developed by AVIAR and used by the biggest airports and ground handlers to train their ground staff. Your role is a ground crew member and you will perform different tasks during an aircraft turnaround process at the airport.

name: Reflection: The Greed
description: What's the worst that can happen from reading a decrepit book? Jon Oz, who's been sifting through pages of a book that shouldn't even have its cover opened, is about to confine himself into a nightmare. Will you end the nightmare when darkness falls? Or will you be a prisoner to your own reflection?

name: Dance of Cards
description: A tactical gambling RPG where you must survive seven days of a deadly cruise playing poker.

name: Mega Man Battle Network Legacy Collection Vol. 2
description: The renowned Mega Man Battle Network series, which has expanded into anime and comics, is back. Volume 2 includes six action packed games from both versions of Mega Man Battle Network 4 to both versions of Mega Man Battle Network 6, plus additional features like a gallery and online play!

name: Mega Man Battle Network Legacy Collection Vol. 1
description: The renowned Mega Man Battle Network series is back! Vol. 1 contains Mega Man Battle Network 1-3, including both versions of Mega Man Battle Network 3 for a total of four titles, plus additional features like a gallery of illustrations and music! In addition, online play is supported!

name: Mega Man Battle Network Legacy Collection
description: Mega Man Battle Network Legacy Collection features all 10 mainline games in the Mega Man Battle Network series!

name: De-Exit: Eternal Matters
description: Embark onto a surrealistic afterlife journey to discover the secrets of the broken and mysterious Plane of Memory in this atmospheric light puzzle-platformer with a hint of stealth. Explore a warm voxel world with an intense cinematic approach. Dive into this deep reflexive experience, meet its inhabitants and save the day!

name: Full Pawer
description: Unlock the power within you in this epic Sandbox RTS adventure! Create lush environments, build impressive villages, and attempt to discover the dark past of Plystia.

name: Princess & Conquest
description:
Enter Princesses. Save the Kingdom.

Princess & Conquest is a hybrid RPG game where you, the Knight, will have to decide the fortunes of a Kingdom, plunged into chaos after a certain "incident"!

The sudden disappearance of a powerful dragon is the spring for a series of events that will plunge the whole Kingdom into chaos! Now it's up to you to either keep everyone in check and save the land or plunge the Kingdom into a pit of insanity.

name: Brave Dungeon: The Meaning Of Justice
description: A sequel that inherits the basic system of the previous Brave Dungeon. You can play in different stories and different systems with the scenarios of the three protagonists.

name: Hero's Last Words
description: A short visual novel about lovers before a final battle

name: Doomium
description: DOOMIUM is a Community Project of megawad worth of short, explosive, and fun ﻿maps made by collective effort of 25 mappers, ranging from mini techbases to dimension-crossing temples and mysterious realms in search for the purest element of Doom.﻿

name: Tori Note
description:
You are a traveling musician sparrow.
Put some food and goodies in the square and call in the unique musicians' sparrows!

name: Co-omets
description: Sin descripción

name: Reef Light Conundrum
description:
Reef Light Conundrum is a standalone realistic urban exploration simulation mixing themes of the paranormal & lovecraftian horror.
A 90s VHS Found Footage Urbex Sim horror with emphasis on atmosphere, unpredictability, realism and a non-linear design, focusing on the feeling of exploring a old haunted ship.

name: Party Connect
description: Play sequences, connecting walls and missing vowels in this online party game show based on BBC's Only Connect

name: Pinball FX: Williams Pinball - Universal Monsters Pack
description: Two scarily authentic tables based on the Universal Monsters—MONSTER BASH and CREATURE FROM THE BLACK LAGOON! Play in their perfectly simulated original form or as remastered tables with updated graphics, animated toys, and a host of new features.

name: Pinball FX: Marvel Pinball - Cinematic Pack
description: Tables inspired by blockbuster films in the Marvel Cinematic Universe come together in this thrilling pack featuring "Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy", "Marvel's Avengers: Age of Ultron" and "Marvel's Ant-Man.

name: Pinball FX: Marvel Pinball - Marvel Legends Pack
description: Team up with iconic Super Heroes as they battle toe-to-toe with notorious villains in the Marvel Pinball: Marvel Legends Pack featuring "Captain America", "Doctor Strange" and "Fantastic Four".

name: Pinball FX: Marvel Pinball Original Pack
description: This four table pack features some of the most iconic Super Heroes in the Marvel Universe: Spider-Man, Wolverine, Blade and Iron Man. Use your pinball wizardry to save the universe from notorious Super Villains! Marvel Pinball is the ultimate Super Hero pinball experience!

name: Boundary: Elite Cosmetic Bundle Founders Pack
description:
This Elite Cosmetic Bundle Founders Pack contains exclusive items.
In dedication to those who engineered and built the Space Elevator, allowing Low Earth Orbit travel a reality. The Engineer Pack for Astroperator Fort contains an unique look specific to her.

name: Senjou no Waltz for Nintendo Switch: Limited Edition
description:
Limited edition of the port of Senjou no Waltz for the Nintendo Switch.

Senjou no Waltz tells the story of village girl Ran, who obtained massive power from a cursed magic sword after losing her parents and hometown. She ended up at an ultranationalistic military school known as Nirvana. It was a unique school, a country in its own right gathering boys and girls that excelled in combat.

name: Battlefield Waltz
description: Battlefield Waltz tells the story of village girl Ran, who obtained massive power from a cursed magic sword after losing her parents and hometown. She ended up at an ultranationalistic military school known as Nirvana. It was a unique school, a country in its own right gathering boys and girls that excelled in combat.

name: Endless Days II
description:
After some lighthouse keepers mysteriously disappear, Matthews, a police detective, goes to the island to investigate and find out what's going on.

He agrees to look after the lighthouse for six months while he investigates the island... But something terrible is about to unfold...

name: Qi Yun Yi Meng
description: Qi Yun Yi Meng (translated as Clouds of Dreams) is a narrative-driven point-and-click adventure puzzle game.

name: Peepers
description: A text based RPG that can be played in your web browser.

name: Call of the Sea VR
description:
Call of the Sea VR is an otherworldly tale of mystery and love, set in the 1930s South Pacific. You’ll explore a lush island paradise, solve puzzles and unlock secrets in refreshing new ways with Meta Quest.

Go on the hunt for your husband’s missing expedition as Norah Everhart, fully voice-acted by Cissy Jones (Firewatch, The Walking Dead: Season 1), and take in the beautiful sights of a cryptic land, uncovering occult mysteries and venturing through forgotten ruins. What will you find among the remnants of a lost civilization?

name: Space Engineers: Automatons
description: Space Engineers: Automatons pack includes Automaton Programmable Block, Automaton Timer Block, Automaton Sensor, Top Mounted Camera, Saddle Cockpit, Emotion Controller, Warning Signs, Angled Interior Wall, Inset Light Block, Pipework Block, Access panels, Air Vent Fan, Robot Helmet Skin, Plastic Armor Skin.

name: Pinball FX: Marvel Pinball - Heavy Hitters
description: Do you have what it takes to handle your favorite Marvel Super Heroes? Prepare for exciting pinball action built around Marvel's most explosive personalities in the Marvel Pinball: Heavy Hitters Pack!

name: Pinball FX: Williams Pinball Volume 6
description: Three classic tables! Funhouse (starring Rudy, the iconic dummy antagonist), Space Station, and Dr. Dude and His Excellent Ray.

name: Pinball FX: Star Wars Pinball - The Last Jedi
description: It's time to play Star Wars Pinball: The Last Jedi! Revisit Luke Skywalker and Rey on Ahch-To Island, and help the Resistance survive the First Order. Relive movie scenes as unique pinball action on these two beautifully crafted pinball tables!

name: Pinball FX: Williams Pinball Volume 1
description: Pinball FX: Williams Pinball - Volume 1 is a dazzling collection of three authentic Williams tables. The Getaway: High Speed II, Junk Yard and Medieval Madness are available in a classic and a re-mastered form with a host of new features.

name: Pinball FX: Star Wars Pinball
description: Feel the power of the Force in Star Wars Pinball! Interact with the most iconic characters, and relive the greatest moments of the Star Wars universe in: Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back, Star Wars: The Clone Wars, and Boba Fett.

name: Pinball FX: Marvel Pinball - Vengeance and Virtue
description: Marvel Pinball returns with Vengeance and Virtue, a package of four brand new beautifully crafted pinball tables featuring Ghost Rider, Moon Knight, Thor and X-Men.

name: Pinball FX: Carnivals & Legends
description: Zen Studios presents the Carnivals and Legends two-table pack featuring original designs, "Adventure Land" and "Son of Zeus."

name: Pinball FX: Marvel Pinball - Avengers Chronicles
description: Marvel's The Avengers (based on the 2012 film from Marvel Studios), Fear Itself, The Infinity Gauntlet and World War Hulk. Avengers Assemble!

name: Pinball FX: Star Wars Pinball - Unsung Heroes
description: Journey to a galaxy far, far away and fight alongside unhailed warriors as they take on the might of the evil Empire in the Star Wars Pinball: Unsung Heroes pack!

name: Pinball FX: Core Collection
description: Core Collection, a package of four beautifully crafted pinball tables featuring Secrets of the Deep, Biolab, Rome and Pasha.

name: Pinball FX: Williams Pinball Volume 3
description: This stunning collection of three authentic Bally tables includes Theatre of Magic, Safe Cracker, and The Champion Pub. All are available in a classic and a remastered form with a host of new features.

name: Pinball FX: Star Wars Pinball - Balance of the Force
description: Feel the disturbance in the Force in Star Wars Pinball: Balance of the Force, featuring three brand new Star Wars pinball tables. The pack includes Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi, Starfighter Assault, and a table dedicated to Darth Vader.

name: Pinball FX: Star Wars Pinball - Heroes Within
description: Celebrate your favorite characters with Star Wars Pinball: Heroes Within featuring four brand new pinball tables including Star Wars Pinball: Han Solo, Star Wars Pinball: Droids, Star Wars Pinball: Episode IV A New Hope, and a table dedicated to the Masters of the Force.

name: Pinball FX: Williams Pinball Volume 5
description: A stunning collection of three authentic Williams and Bally tables! Tales of the Arabian Night, Cirqus Voltaire, and No Good Gofers are all available both in classic form and remastered with a host of new features.

name: Pinball FX: Williams Pinball Volume 2
description: This stunning collection of three authentic Bally tables includes Black Rose, Attack from Mars, and The Party Zone. All are available in a classic and a remastered form with a host of new features.

name: Pinball FX: Williams Pinball Volume 4
description: This stunning collection of three authentic Williams tables includes White Water, Red and Ted's Road Show, and Hurricane. All are available in a classic and a remastered form with a host of new features.

name: Pinball FX: CastleStorm
description: Wanna battle your way through menacing hordes of Vikings? You can do that and more in CastleStorm Pinball, an epic medieval adventure in pinball form. Barge into a world of dragons, swords and... sheep!

name: Pinball FX: Marvel's Women of Power
description: Team up with the stellar female Super Heroes of the Marvel Universe in the Marvel's Women of Power two-pack, which combines two tables featuring Ms. Marvel, Spider-Gwen, Squirrel Girl, Black Widow, Captain Marvel and more as they combat villainy!

name: I Commissioned Some Frogs
description: The brief was simple. Artists were commissioned to create a fantasy world, and hide as many frogs and flies as they can inside it. Now it’s your job to find them all! With 15 art pieces to choose from, and 1500+ hidden objects, you will have a lot of searching to do.

name: I Would Rather Have Cake
description:
Created for O2A2: Queer Jam.

There's a girl, and a pastry chef. They talk about cakes. It's cold.

name: Pinball FX: Crypt of the NecroDancer Pinball
description: Challenge your skills in this pinball and rhythm fusion table, which captures the wacky atmosphere and killer soundtrack of the acclaimed rogue-like. Stop the NecroDancer once more as you use your flippers to battle bosses and acquire the Golden Lute.

name: Pinball FX: Marvel Pinball Collection 2
description: Pinball FX and the Marvel Universe collide in Marvel Pinball Collection 2, bringing together a host of tables inspired by Marvel's exciting cadre of Heroes & Villains in one low priced bundle!

name: Pinball FX: Godzilla vs. Kong Pinball Pack
description: Godzilla and Kong unleash their powers in this epic pinball pack. Play 3 monstrous tables and be the king of the leaderboards.

name: Pinball FX: Williams Pinball - Twilight Zone
description: You just crossed over... into the Twilight Zone. With a pinball that isn't, and flippers that aren't, keep telling yourself it's only a game. Earn highscores that are from another dimension with this classic joining the Pinball FX library.

name: Forklift Extreme: Furniture Direct
description: Play 10 brand new levels and get special operator skin. Unique environment and challenges awaits!

name: Psychiatric Hospital
description: When your madness is not desired, When your madness that you did not want is strangled by the bars in the pit. You go from being a powerless goat to a human being, and the only way to surprise the white coats who want to cure you completely is to take refuge in the craziness you want.

name: Space Lines: Ultimate Edition
description:
A classical Arcade Game for Everyone.
Even More Levels.

Family friendly puzzle game for 1 to 4 players! Play alone or with friends! Conquer more than 100 stages! Battle with various creatures, traps and enjoy your space adventure.

More than 30 ships to unlock! 100 stages! Playable alone or up to 4 players!

name: Dark Desire Mute 4
description: This visual novel continues the life of the girls in the Cindy universe, even at different ages. This way you can explore all kind of kinks and pleasures and topics. This complex story includes also the life's of Stephanie, Michelle, Monica, etc.

name: IGS Classic Arcade Collection
description:
IGS classic arcade game is transplanted for the first time!
Integrate 8 IGS popular arcade games into one piece.
Support up to 4 people online combat!

name: Child Run: City Surfers Runner
description: Become a professional runner by passing all the barriers and obstacles. Explore new cities and take all coins!

name: Parkour Jump Adventure
description: Enter in this wonderful game world of jump and parkour. Your only competitor in this game is you, because you you have to surpass yourself every time with the highest possible results!

name: Puzzle by Nikoli S: Shikaku
description:
Divide the grid into rectangles
in this remarkably satisfying puzzle.

name: Racing in Car
description: Racing in Car offers the soul of motor racing in the most beautiful,authentic and advanced racing game.

name: Gadget Tycoon
description: Gadget Tycoon allows you to step into the shoes of an inventor and embark on a journey to become famous and take on the world with your inventions. Gadget Tycoon is a well-executed game that is fun, intricate, and goes beyond a standard tycoon game by including adventure and story portions

name: Gobyworld
description: An absurd point-and-click adventure, where you help Goby, a piece of swallowed gum, in his quest to find freedom beyond the digestive system.

name: Up All Night: Daybreak
description: Nick just can't let go of the people he's killed.

name: Rubberduck Wave Racer
description: Be a duckling - a squeaky duckling!

name: Arcade Archives: Dig Dug II
description: This marks an exciting comeback!

name: Children of Morn
description: Children of Morn is an erotic adventure and sandbox game set in a dark fantasy world full of vicious demons and alluring witches.

name: Go Go Jump!!
description: Go Go Jump!! is a survival platforming adventure! Take on all the Jump masters to earn your badges or compete in various survival scenarios with your friends!

name: Hyper Hentai Sister Nun
description: Hyper Hentai Sister Nun is a relaxing puzzle game. With the theme of sister nun and multiple unique sexy girls. Enjoy sexy girls pictures and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.

name: Hentai Ayumi
description: What could be more beautiful than hentai?

name: Asuji: The Legend of You
description: You play as "You", a sperm who wants to become Human! Collect all the sperm cells, dodge the crazy sperms and maybe become long enough to inject yourself into the egg!

name: I Commissioned Some Ladybugs
description: The brief was simple. Artists were commissioned to create a fantasy world, and hide as many ladybugs and aphids as they can inside it. Now it’s your job to find them all! With 20 art pieces to choose from, and 2000+ hidden objects, you will have a lot of searching to do.

name: Isekai Junior Manager
description: A protagonist reborn in a noble family of an Isekai was exiled after being deemed useless. With the skills of a misfit and modern knowledge, he aims to be the number one manager in the Isekai!

name: Poly Jigsaw: Butterflies
description: Poly Jigsaw: Butterflies is a traditional style jigsaw puzzle game, with a cute butterflies.

name: Demian Saga
description:
Demian Saga: Chrono Pirates is a collectible RPG with a heavy focus on characters. The game features gorgeous character art, flashy cut scenes, and cute 3D models done in a chibi art style.

The level-sharing system is designed to help characters quickly level up, while the combat system requires players to plan which group of heroes from their pirate crew will engage in battle.

Massive real-time PvP content that allows up to 200 players from four unions (guilds) is also in the works and scheduled to release when the game launches.

name: Deep Dark Dungeon of Anglaus
description: "Deep Dark Dungeon of Anglaus" is a first-person horror game set in a medieval fantasy world. Face the oppressive fears that haunt you in the darkness. Face unknown opponents in the dungeon of the demon lord Anglaus.

name: Vampire Survivors: Tides of the Foscari
description: Tides of the Foscari will be the second DLC expansion for Vampire Survivors, introducing another huge stage as well as a slate of new characters, monsters and weapons to play with. And of course, secrets may be lurking in the shadowed canopies of the deep forest… But as always we can neither confirm nor deny the presence of vampires.

name: Tray Racers! Supporter's Pack
description: Show off your style with this cosmetic pack!

name: JarataireRPG
description: Defeat the demon king with a monster girl as a companion!

name: Bearskull
description: Fight with your friend Skull in Top Down Dungeon Adventure, can you stop Sorkin?

name: Can't Live Without Electricity
description: Can't Live Without Electricity is a 3D relaxing puzzle game in which you supply electricity by connecting houses to power plants.

name: Total War: Warhammer III - Forge of the Chaos Dwarfs
description: The Forge of the Chaos Dwarfs campaign pack introduces a new brutal race, the Chaos Dwarfs, into Total War: Warhammer III, in both the Realm of Chaos and Immortal Empires campaigns. Expand, exploit, and dominate the Warhammer world as Astragoth Ironhand, Drazhoath the Ashen, and Zhatan the Black.

name: Asteroid Arcade
description: Shoot lasers in space because a fish told you to. Asteroid Arcade is a side-scrolling space shoot-em-up which tells the story of a man side-scrolling in space and shooting-em-up. This game has at least 2 characters in it.

name: Kill It With Fire VR
description: The spider: Usually hairy, often poisonous and ALWAYS up to something. Take your arachnophobia to new heights in Kill it With Fire VR, and deal with spiders by any means necessary!

name: Subject
description: [SUBJECT] is a first-person psychological horror game. You wake up confused in a dark room, not knowing where you are. The last thing you remember is a robotic voice echoing through you ears. How you got here or why is unclear, but you do know one thing: You're being watched.

name: Dokapon Kingdom: Connect
description:
Board game x RPG. This is Dokapon Kingdom: Connect.

The only condition for victory is to “earn more money than everyone else.” Players become “heroes” and aim to become “The Hero Who Earns the Most Money.”

The rules are simple. Stop the wheel, move, and follow the instructions on the space.

Defeat monsters, obtain items and treasures, change jobs, get robbed by strange characters, and even rob your friends of their money. No mercy for friends or family! The mischievous battle were anything goes begins now!

name: Hi Pizza
description: A light, fairy-tale and fantastical deciphering game, with a cat being the protagonist.

name: Breachers
description: A multiplayer 5v5 tactical VR FPS in which Enforcers and Revolters - with access to a variety of weapons and gadgets - shoot, vault, climb and strategize their way to victory.

name: I Did Not Buy This Ticket
description: A short horror story about losing your identity. Face your traumas while riding a mysterious bus.

name: Terminal Breach
description: Terminal Breach is an action rogue-lite twin stick shooter where you gun down countless waves of creatures, choose upgrades to create powerful and unique synergies and unlock a variety of characters, weapons and levels.

name: Tray Racers!
description:
The world ended…But the fun didn't!

From the creators of PHOGS!, Tray Racers! is a free-to-play racing game set in a vibrant post-apocalyptic world. Armed with nothing but your trusty tray, you play as a ragtag kid speedster - race solo or with up to 16 players through a wacky playground of randomly-generated sand dunes, cute critters, bouncy cactus forests and more!

Surf the sizzling sands. Dazzle your pals with tray tricks. Hitch a ride on a giant worm. And outspeed your friends to become…the ultimate Tray Racer!

name: House Flipper: Farm
description:
Experience fresh farm vibes, thanks to the latest addition to the House Flipper family.
Let your surroundings be filled with the sounds of the life of your animal companions!
Build homesteads and look after swine, sheep, chickens, and more!
Your very own farming adventure begins now!

Hungry? It's thyme for dinner! Lettuce celebrate!
No matter what you plant, you better take care of creating the right conditions for your vegetation!
A selection of unique tools and a set of farming skills will help you with that!
Prepare the soil, spare no water, and you shall be harvesting plentiful crops in a blink of an eye!

Keeping your farm in check is not just a responsibility, but also a pleasure!
Whistle for your favorite steed, hop in the saddle, and go for a ride around your land.
Keep in mind that this is just the beginning of your adventure, farmer.
Maplebloom Village awaits you!

name: Meatgrinder
description: Meatgrinder is a brutal and fast-paced Roguelite FPS inspired by the best retro shooters and action movies. Fight hordes of punks in ever-changing environments, upgrade your weapons and skills and grind the meat.

name: Dogfight
description: Arcade shoot-’em-up action is back! Team up with the entire family for explosive action, signature humor and thrilling adventure. Join the Sausage Bomber Corps for daring missions to defend the nations of Relishtonia and more against the world-conquering ambitions from the mysterious Vega Nation.

name: Roll For Initiative
description: Roll for Initiative is a virtual translation of modern tabletop gaming, intended to be an introduction to the system for new players and a chance for experienced players to play tabletop games on their own.

name: illWill
description: Eliminate hordes of monsters in illWill, a thrilling first person shooter. The game features breathtaking locations filled with hundreds of monsters and polished gameplay containing all the best of old school shooters. You have a variety of weapons at your disposal - from a double barrel shotgun, warm and beloved as grandma's soup, to a soul ripper with gameplay mechanic unseen before.

name: Software Company
description: Build your own videogame-studio from the early days of videogaming to the future of the industry. Develop the games of your dreams, take care of your employees and mange your business.

name: Hunt the Night
description: Plunge into a retro-style action-adventure game that combines a fast, skilled gameplay with dark fantasy and lore. Play as Vesper, a virtuous member of 'The Stalkers,' and explore the vast world of Medhram, filled with ruins and horrors.

name: Shardpunk
description: A mix of XCOM and Darkest Dungeon, based in a steampunk, rat-infested world.

name: Screaming Chicken: Ultimate Showdown
description: Screaming Chicken: Ultimate Showdown is a wacky multiplayer party game with physics-based slapstick, completely destructible environments, and tons of crazy weapons. Roast other chickens and become the last chicken standing!

name: Fast and Low
description: A VR experience like no other. Take control of either Officer Maximus Faust or Officer Samuel Lo. Or team up locally via asymmetric multiplayer to tackle each scenario. 'Cause when the bad guys gotta go...you gotta hit 'em Fast...and you gotta hit 'em Low.

name: Boundary
description: A multiplayer tactical space-based shooter that puts players in the role of a heavily armed astronauts in space engaging in fierce zero gravity firefights. Fully customizable loadouts, weapons and ammo types across 6 classes of Astronaut for players to choose from in multiple game modes.

name: Capy Island
description: Capy Island is a party game where players, who are capybaras, play minigames on an island to collect hats. These hats will give them a step up in the final showdown where they will all battle it out. The capybara with the most hats wins!

name: The Adventures of Catto Boi
description:
Are you sick of the same old thing over and over again? Generic non-stimulating platforming, little to no plot development, and overall boring gameplay?
Well... unfortunately, you're out of luck.
The Adventures of Catto Boi is the first of many adventures featuring an angry cat who has to find lost cat biscuits scattered all over some random, poorly designed levels.
Doesn't sound fun... But how would you know if you haven't played it?

name: Lands of Languages
description:
Lands of Languages (LoL) is a hobby project developed with the objective of learning language vocabulary in a fun way. Learning requires repetition, which is often boring. So here the repetition is embedded within the grinding tasks of a role-playing game, and the development is heavily focused on gameplay.

In LoL you explore a procedurally generated world inhabited by different beings, which you can capture and train in battles. These battles are the core gameplay, and your battle success depends on solving translation challenges. As your beings level up, you gradually encounter harder challenges and can explore new areas of the world.

name: One Day Hike
description: ONE DAY HIKE is a brief interactive fiction where you revisit an old, familiar hiking trail and recount the memories that you've tried-- and failed-- to leave behind.

name: Paint by Pixel
description:
Paint by Pixel is a relaxing puzzle game where you create beautiful works of art one pixel at a time.

Choose between brush or fill mode, recolor your drawings to personalize them, and use zoom and the magnifying glass to focus on details.
The game also includes an autofill feature and hints to make things easier. With 95 levels to choose from, Paint by Pixel is the perfect game to unwind and explore your artistic side.

name: PUBG: Battlegrounds - Season 23
description: A new challenging Season of Ranked – Season 23 has arrived with this update.

name: OHM 1
description: OHM1 is a compilation of 33 maps that have been made in about an hour each. The idea of this "project" was to make a map in one hour, and then record yourself play the previous map that was posted.

name: Madness Project Nexus: Legacy of the S-3LF Eater
description: Legacy of the S-3LF Eater: a new Story Campaign update! Investigate the origins of the Cyber Bandits and their enigmatic creator, Dr. Gonne, while evading the pursuit of a relentless nightmare. Rumor has it that the doctor's laboratory below the Science Tower has recently opened up again...

name: Atelier Ryza 3: Recipe Expansion Pack - Art of Adventure
description: Gain the upper hand in combat with new recipes! Adds new item recipes that can be used in combat. Also adds new ingredients associated with the (Core Ingredients) category that can be gathered from various areas.

name: Atelier Ryza 3: Recipe Expansion Pack - Alchemy Mysteries
description: Useful new recipes and ingredients for synthesis! Adds new recipes, traits, and Super Traits that can be used in synthesis. Also adds new ingredients that can be gathered from various areas.

name: Extreme Makeover: Home Edition
description:
Good morning family! Ty has arrived in this new match 3 game and he is ready to do some renovation! Are you ready to help him with the home design and the total makeover of the house?
Play exciting match 3 levels and blast your way through the game! Use boosters, bombs, drones, rockets and dynamite to smash the elements or combine them into amazing power-ups! With every game and level you play you will win coins and other currencies that will help you with the renovation and the design of the family’s house!
Demolish the house and build a new one from the ground up, design the exterior, and decorate every room of the house. Plant trees, paint the wall, tile the floor, place furniture, add special decorations and much more! Every family has unique traits and unique rooms to explore and to design and that means there is always something new and exciting coming your way with each family you unlock!
The Features of Extreme Makeover: Home Edition
Exciting and rewarding match 3 action! Every level you pass and every challenge you overcome gets you one step closer to the absolute dream house and rewards you with coins and boosters!
Build the dream house for the family! Use your home design skills to decorate all the types of rooms, from living rooms, kitchens and bedrooms to gardens, garages, playrooms and home!
Tons of amazing items and styles! Help Ty to pick the perfect furniture and decorations for the rooms and give a unique style to the house. Modern or traditional, industrial or casual, every family has its own style and theme!
Another family, another story! Every family has its story. Build a professional office for the remotely working programmer or give the chef of the family a new kitchen to experiment. Create a dino-room or a space-room for the kids and park the car in the new brand garage.
Ty’s Secret Project: Extreme Makeover: Home Edition comes with a few surprises and Ty has always something up his sleeve! Progress the story and live the surprise of new and impressive gifts along with the family!
Join Ty and the rest of the crew of Extreme Makeover: Home Edition in this fantastic match 3 game! Grab your sledgehammer, get your safety helmet on and get ready for some house demolition! Let the design begin and let’s move that bus!

name: Genshin Impact: A Parade of Providence
description:
Version 3.6 of Genshin Impact, which included:
• New characters: Baizhu and Kaveh
• New areas: Gavireh Lajavard and Realm of Farakhkert
• New hangout events for Layla
• New story quests for Baizhu and Nahida
• New main event: A Parade of Providence
• …and more!

name: Daedalus Versus Minotaur
description: An asymmetric multiplayer maze game of fast-paced building and solving!

name: 1 or 3 Addictive Puzzle Game
description: 1 or 3 Addictive Puzzle Game is a puzzle game.

name: I am Rolling
description: A rage platformer game in which you need to control a ball and avoid obstacles on a mission to... I'm not sure... what is your mission... where are you?

name: Diggy: Gold Rush
description: You have a big mission! Help Diggy, the gold miner, dig deep into the earth and draw the path to find the hidden objects. In each expedition you can collect all kinds of items: gold, minerals, precious stones, special objects and much more! Use the ground digger and digging tools to help Diggy get rich!

name: Otherworld Legends: Anibella
description: This content requires the base game Otherworld Legends on Steam in order to play.

name: Ghostwire Tokyo: Spider's Thread
description:
The city’s denizens have been replaced by beings from another world - yōkai, evil spirits, myths and urban legends brought to life. But now isn’t the time to fear the unknown…face it in Ghostwire: Tokyo, now featuring the all-new Spider’s Thread update!

The Spider’s Thread update, available now for all Ghostwire: Tokyo players, adds a new rogue-lite mode to the game on top of other additions to the base campaign, including new enemies, new skills, new areas to explore, new side missions, extended story cinematics, Photo Mode enhancements, new trophies/achievements and more!

name: Them's Fightin' Herds: Stronghoof
description: The 9th character to join the TFH roster is Stronghoof the Reindeer. Conjure an arsenal of icy, magical weaponry and fight alongside his muscly winter sprite Vetr!

name: Hentai Casual Jigsaw: Witches
description: Enjoy our new line of puzzles with Hentai Casual Jigsaw - Witches! With a lot of gorgeous illustrations of beautiful witches and with an open gallery for you to relax and enjoy!

name: Puzzle by Nikoli W Shikaku
description: "Shikaku" is one of Nikoli's own original casse-tête, with simple rules and a unique feeling of solution. Until you get used to it, you'll tend to solve the casse-tête with guesswork, but the real charm lies in solving them with logic. Once you master the method of solving the casse-tête by gradually stretching squares from the numbers, you'll be able to enjoy "Shikaku" on an even deeper level.

name: King of the Arcade
description: Featuring over 40 Playable games, King of the Arcade lets you play as former Champ Mac McCormick, fighting to save Castle's Arcade from a hostile takeover. With epic boss battles and an open-world arcade, reclaim your title as King in this ultimate Arcade experience.

name: Dynopunk: Welcome to Synth-City
description: An ironic adventure with cyberpunk aesthetics set in a world where humans have been replaced by dinosaurs. Become a top-notch repair shop mechanic: fix gadgets, have heart-to-heart talks, and offer drinks to your customers — everything to fulfill your ultimate dream.

name: Brutalism22
description: This is a retro horror game about the war in Ukraine and brutalist architecture in Eastern Europe.

name: Cat Rescue
description: Cat Rescue is a casual 2D Platformer game about a cat finding it's way back home. Can YOU complete the journey?

name: The World of Pirates
description: Welcome in this simulation-action game of "The World of Pirates" where you take the role of a pirate battling to take over the sea.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II - Season 03
description:
Weapons hot vaqueros.
Alejandro and Valeria face off in Season 03

name: Simple Multipliers
description: Unique idle game with endless gameplay mechanics. Hardcore goals but fair possibilities to reach them. Create the most powerful income generator and be the best among all players!

name: Mike and the Zombies
description: The gas runned out and you're in the middle of nowhere! Now it's time to kick, shoot, fire and rip apart zombies and monsters in this 80's thriller platform game.

name: Astral Guardian
description: Build various towers to resist the large number of monsters coming from the wormhole, by extending their walking routes.

name: Crazy Prisoner
description: Crazy Prisoner - is a simple 2D horror game with elements of survival, in which you will play as an escaped prisoner named Joel.

name: Dormitory Hentai Clicker
description: Dormitory Hentai Clicker is a fascinating clicker in which you take on the role of the person in charge of running a dormitory.

name: Urban Cards: Christmas Faction
description: Play this while stuffing your face with the fortieth cookie. Play this while escaping your cousin who wants to explain bitcoin and your uncle with his opinions about inclusive language. Play this while feeling cozy in your ugly sweater and looking scaredly at that unopened gas bill.

name: Train Valley 2: Editor's Bulletin
description: From the creators of the original Train Valley 2 campaign: 30 different levels to explore, drive your trains through and make prompt deliveries.

name: Where Is My Cat?
description: Where is My Cat s a purr-fectly delightful casual game with charming graphics and relaxing gameplay where you help a cute little kitty escape from various obstacles and challenges. Navigate through different levels and use your problem-solving skills to find a way out.

name: Obey Me! Nightbringer
description: An otome game where you raise seven ikemen demon brothers to YOUR liking. Enjoy your life in the Devildom with Obey Me! Nightbringer!

name: Maximus 2: Street Gladiators
description: A fantasy beat-em-up that focuses on crunchy and satisfying combat. We captured the spirit of some of the best classic beat-em-ups, melding them into one memorable experience. Fight solo or with up to 4 players cooperative multiplayer!

name: Spurdo :D
description: Spurdo :D is an Action Adventure Comedy game where you play as Spurdo, travelling to different past lives, each containing its own separate story, style, and gameplay mechanics. Offering a wide variety of scenarios and humorous interactions, you choose how you want to experience those lives again.

name: Rogue Valley
description: Immerse in a classic 90's rogue-like adventure with friends in Rogue Valley, a MMO rogue-like experience!

name: Grow Your Pets
description: You found a mysterious egg. By deciding to open it, your life has changed forever. Now you are the Pet Grower. Everyone thinks that all these creatures are extinct. But you know that there is someone, who chose exactly you. Wander through the forest, fish for food, upgrade pets. This is your world!

name: Open At Nine
description: “Massive debt, a shabby brothel, and a naughty succubus… This is all I get for defeating the Demon Lord?!” Hire monster girls to attract customers and pay off your debts! Don't forget to give your girls lots of hands-on job training!

name: Decks of Power
description: Decks of power is an action rougelite deck-building game with a twist. Players are not allowed to discard unwanted cards and must figure out strategic opportunities to use them against the enemy. Enemies level up each time you defeat them in battle and are stronger when you encounter them again.

name: X4: Kingdom End
description: Enjoy a long-awaited reunion with the Boron in X4: Kingdom End, the fourth expansion for X4: Foundations, which completes the collection of the main factions in the X Universe. Discover the unique Boron ships, and fly them through distinctive systems, on a journey of discovery.

name: Cardboard Town
description: Cardboard Town is a city building card game. Manage your resources, obtain upgrades, draw your cards and thrive! Random events, quest cards and options make each run different. Use your Action Cards wisely along with your Building Cards.

name: Road to Devadatta
description: Road to Devadatta is a first person adventure game focused on story and puzzle solving in order to progress. Explore an ancient temple find out why you are there! Use your wits and skills to escape from him! But be careful because you are not alone!

name: Lightracer Spark
description: Lightracer Spark is a Sci-Fi Narrative game. You are a reviser from a high civilization, descending to various extraterrestrial worlds. Guide all living beings to prosperity, or nip a spark in the bud. Accumulate strength through choices and strategies to grasp the rise and fall of all civilizations

name: Golfinite
description: Play golf, complete challenges, buy new gear, gain experience, level up, and compete in tournaments on your quest to become a Professional Golfer! Golfinite is a fun and relaxing golf game, where each course, challenge, and playthrough is unique.

name: Flooded
description: Flooded is a reversed city-builder, in which you need to optimize your production on an island that shrinks over time. Gather enough resources to flee to safety, while the surrounding world is getting flooded.

name: Wildfrost
description: Take on the elements in Wildfrost, a tactical roguelike deckbuilder! Journey across a frozen tundra, collecting cards strong enough to banish the eternal winter…

name: Ghostwire: Tokyo - Deluxe Edition
description: Tokyo's population has vanished, and deadly supernatural forces prowl the streets. Use an arsenal of elemental abilities to unravel the truth behind the disappearance and save Tokyo.

name: Murderous Muses
description: Spend three nights in a cursed gallery solving the cold-case murder of Mordechai Grey, a tortured artist killed by one of six deadly muses. Hang portraits to see into the past, whilst solving puzzles and exploring ever-changing rooms. Will you be artful enough to catch the murderous muse?

name: Rusted Moss
description: Traverse the perilous lands of a dying world in this bullet-hell inspired metroidvania! Strong enemies emerge from distant lands as the iron inventions of men succumb to the decay of rust and time. Use a trusty grappling hook and uncover new powers to battle monstrous machines, powerful witches, and explore a new emerging world.

name: Ascendum
description: Help 2 twin vessels on their journey through the afterlife! Overcome platforming and mind-bending puzzle challenges, and defeat scary enemies and bosses while controlling both characters at the same time or working together with another player in local Co-op.

name: Wartales
description: Wartales is an open world RPG in which you lead a group of mercenaries in their search for wealth across a massive medieval universe. Explore the world, recruit companions, collect bounties and unravel the secrets of the tombs of the ancients!

name: Plantera 2: Golden Acorn
description: The round blue Helpers return to tend to the garden once more and grow the big magical oak tree that have been rumored to have placed its seed there. Tend to the oak tree and grow it to the sky to harvest its Golden Acorns.

name: Caliber
description: Caliber is a free-to-play, team-based, tactical third-person shooter focused on special forces units from all over the world. Four classes, more than 60 operators with unique abilities and equipment, and various game modes: PvE, PvP and PvPvE.

name: Sniper Elite 5: Death From Above Weapon and Skin Pack
description:
Death From Above is the second content pack in Season Pass Two bringing a new rifle in the shape of the Pedersen, a weapon skin and two character skins.

The Pedersen rifle was proposed as part of a program to adopt a semi-automatic replacement to the M1903. It features no scope options but is arguably best-in-class for ironsight usage and is capable of firing fast, accurate shots at medium range, with great overall stability.

You will also receive the striking British Dazzle weapon skin, available for all weapons, pays homage to the dazzle camouflage design used on British tanks during desert campaigns.

Finally, both Karl and Monika receive new character skins. The British Bomber skin for Karl gives him a distinct aviator look while the Air Auxiliary skin for Monika reflects the uniforms worn by the women’s air-corps whose job was to transport new or repaired planes to active military airfields throughout the UK.

name: Saints Row: Dead Island 2 - Cosmetic Pack
description:
HELL-A meets Weird West in this FREE cosmetic pack inspired by DEAD ISLAND 2!

Dress your Boss with items from reckless antihero Jacob and quick-witted athlete Amy. Apply shock and awe with a new blunt weapon, stagger with swagger with a new emote, and evoke bitey beachside memories with a new HQ collectible!

name: Party Party Time: Party Even Harder Pack
description: The party just got even more fun! Enjoy 10 new minigames! Get ready for Party Even Harder, a new downloadable content pack for Party Party Time! Enjoy 10 brand new minigames! Party even harder together!

name: Rider Worlds
description:
Welcome to the long-awaited sequel to the legendary Rider game (150 millions downloads worldwide)!

Feast your eyes with brand new 3D graphics, and unleash your riding skills throughout the unique Worlds of Rider Worlds. Each of them provides a unique riding experience, and offers lots of content to unlock!

Grab one of the 18 unique vehicles and start flipping through 150 killer challenges!

name: Dark Tales: Mirror and Mad Princess
description: A dark mobile RPG based on classic fairy tales.

name: When the Strawberry Muffin Ate a Goth
description: This is a short story about two girls meeting one night, taking a liking to each other, and exploring themselves further. Weighing in at around ~7.5k words, it is more akin to a kinetic novel, except for the lack of images.

name: Mighty Quest: Rogue Palace
description:
In this roguelite action mobile game, the King has fallen into an endless slumber, and the Kingdom is on the brink of falling into oblivion. To save the Kingdom, you’ll need to enter the King’s mind palace and hack and slash your way through his twisted nightmare full of goblins, banshees, and bosses.

On your quest, you'll be able to unlock 20 playable heroes from the Mighty Quest universe, including the mighty Lord Logan and the infamous plague doctor Coma, as well as loot that will help level up your combat. The King's mind palace takes the shape of a massive maze with 15 different zones that have been overrun by a purple-ish goo called the void. You'll need to eradicate the void as you make your way through the maze, but beware - each zone contains unique enemies and deadly bosses.

In the Hub, you'll be able to prepare for your next run, selecting which hero to play as and equipping them with a build. The hero you choose will also dictate where you start in the maze. In addition, you'll unlock new perks and upgrades that will empower you in your fight against the void.

name: Magic City Detective: Rage Under Moon DLC
description: Explore additional locations and achieve new goals! Could you become a werewolves' true friend? Let’s find out what you’re capable of!

name: Grim Tales: Dual Disposition - Collector's Edition
description: When a souvenir shop dealing in oddities is ransacked, you’re shocked when you’re the prime suspect! Your double has come from another reality to disrupt the flow of magic, taking your abilities in the process. Can you save the sources of magic and clear your name in time?

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: Brazil
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: Reptiles
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: Fish
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: Japan
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: Trains
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: Cars
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: Dogs
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: Boats
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: Reptiles 2
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: Cats
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: France
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: China
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: Horses
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: Planes
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: U.K.
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: India
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: Spain
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: Electronics
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: Birds
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: Motorcycles
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Military Tanks
description: Do you like tanks game? Are you ready to feel the full power of a tank games?

name: Worms W.M.D Mobilize
description:
The worms are back in their most destructive game yet. With a gorgeous, hand-drawn 2D look, brand new weapons, vehicles and buildings plus the return of some much-loved classic weapons and gameplay, Worms W.M.D: Mobilize is the best worms experience ever.

Work your way through 10 training and 20 campaign missions of increasing difficulty using the huge arsenal of new and classic weapons at your disposal. Use new vehicles to cause chaos amongst the enemy ranks and use buildings to gain the tactical advantage as you try to dominate the battlefield!

Take on opponents in hilarious all-out tactical worm warfare either in local or online multiplayer. Flatten your opponents with the Concrete Donkey. Turn them into chunks of worm meat with the Holy Hand Grenade. Rain down hell from above in helicopters or pound them into oblivion with the tank. With 50 weapons and utilities at your fingertips, this is Worms at its chaotic best!

name: Hotel Renovator: Kawaii Furniture Set
description: Invite your guests on the most adorable stay with the Kawaii Furniture set.Give your hotel that youthful glow with the Kawaii Furniture set, packed with the cutest 53 items that will make any of your customers' heart melt. With its bright colors and playful patterns, life truly is all sunshine and rainbows!

name: Poop Collector: Number 2
description:
The poop gods have found out about the disaster you brought upon them in your previous mission and they are furious!

They have located you on earth and took you to a hidden cave somewhere on the planet "Pooparium" and the only way to escape and get back home is to play their game and show them why you are the best poop collector out there!

This time they are making your life harder with obstacles and more challenging rooms so go out there and show them how fast you can shame them and clear their rooms to escape back home!

Feedback is always welcome, enjoy!

name: Sherlock Holmes: The Awakened - The Sleuth's Attire
description:
Get ready to immerse yourself even deeper and channel your inner detective with three new Victorian-era-inspired costumes!

With the Clergyman Cassock, you'll give the impression of a true man of the cloth, ready to absolve even the most hardened sinners.

Unleash your inner detective with the Master Sleuth costume. This sleek and sophisticated outfit will make you the talk of the town, and give your character the mystery and intrigue of a true virtuoso investigator, ready to solve even the most challenging of mysteries.

The Consulting Detective outfit adds a classic touch to your look and elevates your immersive experience.

name: That Rocket Game
description: That Rocket Game is the ultimate space themed relaxing arcade game. Upgrade your rocket to reach further into the unknown...

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World
description: A selection of photographic jigsaw puzzles. Customize your puzzle experience and expand the game with DLC.

name: Deathly Dangerous
description: The game "Deathly Dangerous" is an arcade shooter for the extermination of the undead, whose souls cannot find peace. To correct an annoying mistake, Death itself decides to take up arms...

name: Jurl
description: A sci-fi fixed arena shooter, where you can't shoot. Collect the Star Diamonds whilst avoiding the hazards using your thrusters to rotate your ship and then thrusting forward. You can't kill the enemy, so your only weapons are movement, speed and getting you opponents to wipe each other out.

name: SokoLab
description: SokoLab is a Sokoban game where you play as a cute robot! Push blocks to the objective to reach the end of the level, new mechanics are introduced throughout the game adding layers of complexity to the puzzles! Can you reach the last level?

name: Overwatch 2: Season 4 - Space Opera
description:
Blossom onto the battlefield with our newest Support Hero Lifeweaver, progress through the Battle Pass to earn rewards including Mythic Galactic Emperor Sigma, and fight for your faction when The Watchers and The Infinite Empire clash in the Starwatch event!

Explore Talantis, the first-ever map made in collaboration with the community.

Enjoy major quality-of-life updates with a revamped Competitive experience.

name: Fourteen Fiends
description: Fourteen Fiends is a single player fantasy action adventure card game!

name: The Green Room Experiment: Episode 1 VR
description: You're locked in a dream and you need to wake up. This game is designed on an escape game structure, you must solve a puzzle to move on to the next table. You will be transported to a dreamlike, strange universe, mixing exploration, mystery and poetry.

name: The ABC
description: This is the ABC story of Hee-chan's encounter with Brahmanism. Because Hee-chan is a girl who has a strong sense of justice, she is easy to lose her temper. Brahmana knows such a person's feature very well and he smells cinders from Hee-chan. Where does the smell of future comes from?

name: Magic City Detective: Rage Under Moon - Collector's Edition
description: Fear destroys the concept of values, but should not break you on the way to unraveling the disappearance of the Animages. Stop the kidnappings and relieve the city from fear!

name: Monopoly Go!
description: Become rich beyond your wildest dreams in this newly reimagined version of Monopoly! Let everyone’s favorite billionaire, Mr. Monopoly, be your guide as you explore new boards themed after world-famous cities, fantastical lands, and more.

name: Sherlock Holmes: The Awakened - Premium Edition
description:
The Premium Edition Includes:
- Sherlock Holmes The Awakened
- Exclusive Pre-Launch DLC - The Sleuth's Attire (3 costumes)
- Set of digital wallpapers
- The Whispered Dreams Side Quest Pack
- Sherlock Holmes The Awakened Soundtrack
- Sherlock Holmes The Awakened Artbook

name: Sherlock Holmes: The Awakened - Deluxe Edition
description:
The Deluxe Edition Includes:
- Sherlock Holmes The Awakened
- Exclusive Pre-Launch DLC - The Sleuth's Attire (3 costumes)
- Set of digital wallpapers
- The Whispered Dreams Side Quest Pack

name: Sherlock Holmes: The Awakened - The Whispered Dreams
description: Unlock exciting side cases that expand the world of The Awakened beyond the main adventure. Enjoy new stories, mysteries, and investigations, sure to satisfy your hunger for more detective work. You will need all of your investigative skills to unravel these baffling mysteries, and uncover the extraordinary truths behind them.

name: Core Fault
description: Control a remote operated mining droid to mine the planet's most valuable resource: Cores. But, beware - the inhabitants don't take too lightly to their home being excavated. Use crank operated movement to weave around enemies, collect Cores, and dig deeper into the fault.

name: Vessel Blue
description: In this Point & Click Puzzle Horror Game, you sit at a desk trying to solve puzzles using your old computer, whilst being hunted by a terrifying monster. You can’t run away or walk in this game; you are stuck to your chair!

name: Towers Together
description: Towers together is a cooperative tower defense game with cards. Combine your cards with your friends’ cards to achieve powerful combo, but get ready to fail and laugh together. Build towers, cast spells, have fun with friends!

name: Unscripted
description: Dive into the world of a wannabe writer and his friends trying to make it in Hollywood. Build deep friendships, go on hilarious adventures and fall in love. Make highly impactful choices and shape your story in one of the most ambitious visual novels ever created.

name: Long Dream
description: Zhao Sheng, a retired postman, has been suffering from dementia over the past years. He insists that his partner Qi Mei is waiting for him under a peach tree. Zhao Sheng’s family didn't want him to leave with any regrets and decided to go and find that peach tree he had been talking about...

name: Process of Elimination: Deluxe Edition
description:
Process of Elimination - Deluxe Edition includes:

- Process of Elimination Nintendo Switch Game / PS4 Game
- Digital Soundtrack
- Mini Art Book

name: Tron: Identity
description: Something has been taken. Enter a new Grid and forge alliances via visual novel gameplay, uncovering truths through Identity Disc puzzles. Make critical decisions and plot your own course in a world without a creator.

name: Sherlock Holmes: The Awakened
description: Experience a nerve-racking Lovecraftian adventure, rebuilt from the ground up with modern graphics and gameplay. Become Sherlock Holmes, and find yourself at the heart of the terrifying Cthulhu Mythos as you investigate a series of mysterious disappearances in Europe and the US.

name: Sparrow Solitaire
description:
Sparrow Solitaire takes the classic tile-matching puzzle game mahjong solitaire, and reimagines it from the ground-up for Playdate. With simple rules and plenty of customizable options, the game is accessible to both new players and veterans of the genre.

Choose from hundreds of layouts, including classics from the original Shanghai to designs referencing other Playdate games. Can’t decide? Play the Daily Layout and share your scores via QR code!

Customize almost every aspect of your experience: tile designs, backgrounds, music, and controls. Or create new layouts with a built-in editor. We also include several helpful options, such as a 2x zoom.
