Play against a friend in the 2P challenge mode, or try the alternative matching rules in the Shisen-sho variant.

With some of the most robust stat tracking found on Playdate, you can track your scores, wins, times, and more for each layout.

name: Knight and Mourning
description: Knight And Mourning is a fast-paced, rage-inducing 2D platformer where you are on a mission to find your lost sword. Run, jump, dodge spikes, and suffer.

name: Moonleap
description: In search of a more beautiful night, the moon child descends to retrieve some shooting stars.

name: Floating Islands of Nucifera
description: Floating Islands of Nucifera is an open world shopkeeping game set in an abandoned world in the sky. Adventure across the fantasy world of Nucifera in your airship, summon powerful creatures to your side to aid in dangerous turn-based combat, and loot treasures to help pay off your family's debt!

name: Rendezvous
description: Rendezvous is a 2.5D pixel art action-puzzle adventure game where you follow Setyo, an ex-agent living his quiet life only to find his sister, fraught with danger in the dystopian 2064's city of Neo-Surabaya.

name: Minds of Nations
description: After a number of incarnations on Earth and unhappy with the opportunities nations offer souls to grow, our hero, Kanli (you) is offered a chance to .. do better. He will try, over a number of simulations, to build a state, survive the hardships of time whilst helping as many souls as possible evolve beyond the taints.

name: Coal Mining Simulator
description: Welcome to the world of Coal Mining! Start with almost nothing and get to the top - develop your mine, sell coal, buy new machines and avoid dangers in this sandbox simulator. Take control of numerous mining machines. Destroy, mine, drill, transport and blow things up.

name: Goblin and Coins 2
description: Years have passed, decades maybe. Little goblin moved on, all but forgot about the great coin trouble, not even realizing that a new trouble is awaiting behind the doors!

name: Super-Spatial
description: Explore, build, and master the art of automation. Build your base, discover colorful new worlds, and develop new technologies as you tame the far reaches of space and search for a way to return to Earth.

name: The Mouth Of The Woods
description: Search for a friend missing in the woods.

name: Hi-Fi Rush: Bossplay Costume Pack
description: Dress up your crew with this set of six outfits inspired by the bosses of Hi-Fi RUSH! Being bad never felt (or looked) so good

name: Dixie Kong Country
description: A mod that replaces Donkey Kong with Dixie Kong, along with her gliding abilities.

name: Cardania: Epoch Wars
description: Epoch Wars is a live multiplayer strategy game with hundreds of players from around the world. Battle for strategic resources, explore mysterious anomalies, earn EXP and Victory Points for yourself and one of 7 unique Factions, all vying for control of Cardania! Experience a dynamic, shifting map which provides players with a totally fresh experience every 5 days (called an Epoch). Epoch wars utilizes the latest in fast and secure blockchain + NFT technology, so players truly own their lands, cards, and battle units!

name: Dreamwater
description: A short, fragmented experience created in RPG maker for Domino Club's Dream Gallery Jam. Dreamwater provides the player with snippets of thoughts on the theme of liquid.

name: Behind The Red Dais
description: Flowers of love and pain.

name: Traumakt-4.Sexe
description: A Domino Club Production by Protag Nude Incorporated Software.

name: Laser Tanks
description: Laser Tanks is a fast-paced Top Down RPG shooter game where you battle hordes of alien monsters and bosses in various environments using advanced weapons and laser tanks. The game features unique monsters, numerous weapons, and different laser tanks to operate.

name: Im Doing Better Now
description: Im Doing Better Now is a moody visual novel by warning stripe.

name: Entity Room
description: Entity Room is a short indie horror game, in which you're working in an underground lab. Your job is to ensure the entity is being fed every day and the rooms are cleaned afterwards.

name: The Door
description: The Door is a short supernatural horror game made in a month for "The Forgotten Tapes: Analog Nightmares", and the debut game for it's developer.

name: Banana Heroes: Fruit Survivor
description:
While our Banana hero is powerful and capable of learning and using vast majority of weaponry and skills, we needs YOU to guide it through the endless waves of evil zombies to become the ultimate top gunner and save the day.

As our Banana Heroes gains experience through hard fought battles, you decide which weapon it 'll learn and use

Are you a fan of Survival - Top gunner - Pixel Arcade game? Are you a fan of Survivor Games? From a complete basic to the mightiest hero, combine the best skills to destroy zombies and become the last survivor! You can create thousands of unique skill combinations to overcome the challenges and survive every wave of enemies’ attacks.

name: Quadanoid
description:
A breakout clone with a twist!

There are no walls, only paddles and bricks.
The idea is to use the paddles as walls and clear the level.
Each level brick layout is randomly generated and everytime you clear a level the movement speed increases.

Let's see how far you can get :)

Enjoy!

name: Dead Space Demake
description: Dead Space Demake has everything you want and more, from necromorph limb dismemberment to affine texture mapping errors. You've played Dead Space (2008) and you've played Dead Space (2023) it's time to soak in the horrid vibes of Dead Space (1998)

name: A Thesis for Truth
description: An interactive fiction game.

name: Find!
description: You play as a robber who has decided to rob the local mafiosi and run away with the loot. You have 10 levels to go through, each of which you will have to look for hidden objects.

name: QR Escape
description: A puzzle-solving mystery based in an art gallery. You will be constructing and scanning imaginatively designed QR codes to solve the mystery.

name: Samurai Survivor: Undefeated Blade
description: Samurai Survivor: Undefeated Blade is a Roguelike action game! Fight off mythical youkai enemies with your close combat techniques as one of three unique characters. Discover different sub-weapons and items in each game run to gain an edge in battle.

name: Cat Pipes
description: Rotate the pieces to create paths of energy and light up the charming scenario with adorable cats. Challenge your mind with the cozy puzzle game of connecting pipes.

name: Beyond the Mountains
description: Uncover a vast land filled with secrets, monsters, and ancient myth in BEYOND THE MOUNTAINS, a top-down action RPG about a lost soul who uncovers a mysterious secret. Lost in a foreign land and armed only with your wits and curiosity, you will collect items, unlock secrets, and fight monsters.

name: Vira
description: Maxim Bludnev helps his father, who got into a mess. A funny 2D Quest that will show a simple story with black humor and interesting details!

name: AlcoFox
description: Join the adventure as a squirrel-fox in a fantasy world, exploring dark forests, mines, and swamps. Fight creatures and solve puzzles to reach the city of Dementia and a brighter future. Engaging gameplay, stunning visuals, and a compelling storyline make this game an epic experience.

name: Hypermarket Tycoon Manager
description: Hypermarket Tycoon Manager is an engaging business simulation game where you take on the role of a young entrepreneur who aims to build and grow a successful supermarket business.

name: Hentai Pink
description: Hentai Pink is a jigsaw puzzle. You must use your wisdom to put the puzzle back to its original shape.

name: The Last Saintess
description: The offensive of the undead begins. Gather holy power to summon soldiers and strengthen the starlight of Hellendil to defeat the undead.

name: The Test: Secrets of the Soul 2
description: You will answer questions that will reveal things deep within. Some will be uncomfortable, but with great knowledge comes great sacrifice. Can you make it all the way through The Test, and are you SURE you want the answers you seek? For it is time to once again unlock "Secrets of the Soul..."

name: Fateful Mages
description: Relaxing 2d puzzle game where you unlock characters and stories through solving puzzles and decide their fate in a magical but unforgiving world.

name: Tales of the Rays: Recollection
description:
Recollection is the next major update for Tales of the Rays and was shown on the games 6th anniversary broadcast.

With the main story of the game completed at the end of the 4th scenario, Last Cradle, this update for the game will introduce a new story with 6 new characters.
So far a new system, Successive Stories, involving older titles from the franchise has been shown and a combat system overhaul was also revealed.

Another stream is planned for March 30th with more information about the update.

name: Photon Engineer
description: Master laser manipulation and environmental control in this sci-fi puzzle game. Unleash your creativity and uncover the secrets of mysterious platforms that have suddenly appeared near Jupiter.

name: Jetpac Too
description: A free frantic and fast paced reimagining of the classic Jetpac with All Vs All or Team Match with unique real-time terraforming played over the surface of a planetoid.

name: NervBox
description: NervBox is a VR, physics-based, multiplayer sandbox where players can experience an unparalleled level of co-op interaction and combat.

name: Fateweaver: Smash or Pass
description: You are The Fateweaver; an ancient beast of legendary status. It is your job to determine which way Fate will unravel as you dig deep into the psyche of those who beckon. Decide whether to help those who beg for your mercy, or invoke the wrath of the Gods upon those you deem unworthy of existence...

name: Gwen the Hen 64
description: Gwen the Hen 64 is a tiny 3D platformer collectathon, with precise controls and many different movement options.

name: Lovely Crush
description: Explore little story about few beautiful catgirls. Here you can relax, forget about all your problems and enjoy with charming relaxing puzzle game

name: Christmas Night
description: Christmas Night is a story-themed horror game about Christmas and its beliefs. Will we be rewarded for being a good girl this Christmas or will we be punished for being a spoiled person?

name: Godfist
description: Godfist is a single-player first person roguelike deck builder, where you have to punch enemies off the tower to progress. Your mission is to climb to the top of the tower and punch god in the face.

name: Fear of Mine
description: Fear of Mine - a visual novel in the genre of adventure and horror. This game will tell a linear but incredibly deep story in which the main characters fell under the influence of an alien mushroom creature. It seems to take over the whole world

name: Miniland
description:
The world doesn't generate itself - you do it, shape the world as you wish! Start with nothing, and build dream houses for goblins and yourself while exploring, collecting resources, crafting, building, fighting, farming... and more!

Miniland is a game where you can do anything you want to! Of course you will still need to eat something from time to time, but beside that, there are no restrictions!

You start with a small patch of land, that with time you can expand by yourself with biome tiles which you receive every day.

In no time, you will find yourself in a big and pretty house with a farm beside, crafting new tools and exploring caves.

name: Cynthia: Hidden in the Moonshadow
description: Emotional 3rd-person story-driven exploration game focused on solving puzzles and using stealth mechanics. Use your bow to interact with environment elements. Sneak, climb or distract guards to move further unnoticed. Solve light puzzles alongside your path to rescue your loved one.

name: Soundodger 2
description: Soundodger 2 is an experimental dodge-em-up music game that turns every song into a choreographed dance of bullets, lasers, and challenges to weave through in order to survive. The sequel to 2013's award-winning Soundodger+, Soundodger 2 is bigger, better, and dodgier than ever before. With an all-new selection of songs from international musicians and a fully-featured level editor to use your own music, you'll never run out of things to dodge.

name: The Witch's Night Watch
description:
Your nightly duty awaits you...
Guard the graveyard from mischievous ghosts that rise every night and make it until sunrise.

Use magic spells, your broom, quick dodges, and summoned allies to help you survive the one-minute onslaught, with random nerfs and buffs being applied between every level.

name: ChocoLot!
description: A little game that was originally intended for Valentine's Day, but you can play it any time you wish!

name: Dogs of the Dark
description: Dogs of the Dark is a role-playing game that pulls inspiration from retro RPGs from the 90s and the quirky ones from the 2000s. It features a full 5+ chapter campaign filled with dumb jokes, strange characters, and retro pixel art graphics akin to 8-bit or 16-bit games.

name: Endgame of Devil
description: As the Devil, command your minions to defeat the greedy adventurers! Explore over a hundred unique followers, sixty diverse monsters, and discover various battle strategies. Enjoy the convenience of one-click auto battles!

name: Graveyard Miner
description: Enter the world of Graveyard Miner, an exciting mobile game that combines the best of tycoon merge games and mining clicker games. As a graveyard miner, you'll explore graves to find treasures, bones, and artifacts, unlocking new graveyards, upgrading your minions, and collecting cards and special abilities to become a graveyard tycoon.

name: Syndoy
description: Syndoy is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame.

name: Valkyrie Idle
description:
A story of growing up to protect the world of Valkyrie and go looking for the gods.
Adventure through stages and dungeons and nurture a character and companions through farming

name: Undone
description: The tagline for this short piece of interactive fiction is, "a lifetime of doubts in an instant of self-destruction." Undone unfolds in the moments between two scenes at a research lab in Antarctica. Text and images explore topics in consciousness, organization, physics, and dreams.

name: Piggy: Chapter 1
description:
Piggy kidnapped you!

Therefore, you will have to escape from the house by solving puzzles and using objects to get out of that place.

name: Dreamer Adventure
description: An adventure platformer created with pulp for dreamers !

name: Entropy: Zero - Uprising
description: Entropy: Zero - Uprising is a mod for Half-Life 2: Episode Two that lets you play as a Civil Protection Unit during the Uprising. The mod features a full campaign of 20 maps, a unique storyline, new enemies and weapons, a fully voiced cast of characters, and a soundtrack composed by various artists.

name: Paper Mario Eggstraordinary Egg Hunt
description:
Join Mario & Luigi for the annual Easter Egg Hunt in Toad Town and close regions like Koopa Village and Shooting Star Summit!

A Paper Mario Mod made by Miigle and Den / DenNya as a easter present for the Paper Mario Modding Community.

name: Producer Tycoon
description: A casual tycoon game where you play as an up and coming music producer. Design your character to look how you want. Select a genre and style, and wait to hear a random song from the selected choices

name: Arcanika
description: Travel to a storybook world and help its denizens bring life back to the glade. Their world is in danger. The life force that once made things grow has disappeared and they need your help to restore it. Complete exciting Match-3 puzzles while earning treasure and achievements along the way.

name: The Mystery of the Mayan Ruins
description: Welcome to our new edition of The Mystery saga. This time we take to you The Mystery of the Mayan Ruins! J. Smith is a retired treasure hunter until one day his family is kidnapped.

name: Lost in LS
description:
"Lost in LS" is a narrative and exploration game that marks the thrilling finale of a wacky and irreverent trilogy. As the mother of the protagonist from the previous games "Waking Up in LS" and "The Heist in LS", you embark on a mission to find your missing daughter. When you go to the police station to report her disappearance, they dismiss your claims. Determined to find her, you take matters into your own hands, searching for clues and following leads that take you to unexpected places.

Don't expect a typical rescue mission - Explore LS and interact with its eccentric locals to gather information, solve puzzles, and uncover the truth. But remember, danger lurks around every corner, from the sewers to Ronaldo's mansion, and you must stay one step ahead to save your daughter.

With immersive gameplay, pixel art graphics, and a captivating storyline, this adventure will keep you on the edge of your seat. Will you be able to bring your daughter back home and expose the truth behind the kidnapper? Play now to find out!

name: Super Freaks Classic Pack
description: Super Freaks Classic Pack compiles all of the original Super Freaks games, all available in one collection. It also includes the long-awaited Strato-Scruffy! A few of them include "polished" versions that have been rebalanced with bug fixes and quality-of-life features.

name: Anime Sudoku
description: An anime styled sudoku puzzle game.

name: Yudashi Peril: Floraison
description:
The year is 2013, and Homura Asano is trying to get by as a second year at the prestigious Ainami Academy. Up until the beginning of the second semester, she hasn't had much in the way of friends, hasn't participated in any clubs, and has never had a girlfriend. Most of all, she has a strong premonition that she will not live to see her third year. Is it possible to change the course of her life and avert this fate?

Throughout the course of the game, you will be able to raise Homura's stats by choosing different activities and make attempts to get closer to other girls at school in order to forge bonds through route events. While romance plays a significant part in her life and desires, not every route is romantic. Friendship plays just as valuable a role as dating in her story.

name: Bruxólico
description: Bruxólico is a new action platformer for the ZX Spectrum where you will hear/play/read the story of the Ghost-Ox, the little creature that came out from a doomed bottomless well, along with other unbelievable witchlish beings, fruits of our own ills and maledictions.

name: Lone King: Expansion
description: Expansion Content:2 new abilities per maniple2 new story chaptersUnlocks Team ModeMore content based on player demand

name: Crash Bandicoot: Back In Time
description: A love letter to Crash Bandicoot in the form of a game that features 5 traditional levels, 5 flashback tape levels, time trials and the Crash Creator: an awesome level creator.

name: Hololive CouncilRyS RPG
description: Hololive CouncilRyS RPG is a fangame and love letter to Hololive CouncilRyS, built in RPG Maker MZ with custom art assets by me and original musical arrangements of Hololive songs by Jeremy Robson. Expect the game to be about 3 hours long.

name: Nightshade Ninja Warrior
description: Nightshade Ninja Warrior is an action-packed game that combines elements of adventure, combat, and stealth. Players take on the role of a skilled ninja, who must traverse a dangerous landscape filled with enemies, obstacles, and treacherous terrain. As players progress through the game, they will encounter various enemies, each with their unique strengths and weaknesses. Combat sequences are fast-paced and intense, with players using a variety of abilities to defeat their foes. The game also features challenging boss fights, where players must utilize their skills and strategy to emerge victorious.

name: Furious Farm: Total Reap Out
description:
Furious Farm is the world's first Combine-Harvester racing game. Battle 7 other farmers to see who can reap the biggest portion of the field in this crazy arcade game. Every round 2 farmers get eliminated, and the remaining ones get to upgrade their machine. Will you make it to the end and win the Grain Prix? Alternatively, get up to 3 other players and play against them for a fun and unique party game!

Who said farming should be relaxing?

name: You Will Fall
description: You're standing on the roof of a building staring at the thin tightrope stretched taught over the wide expanse. Your one goal is to make it across. Only problem is, you will fall. It is inevitable. Good thing you have this voice inside your head to constantly remind you of your fate.

name: Magic Pussy: Chapter 1
description: Magic Pussy: Chapter 1 is an adult Visual Novel About the priggishness of a young student of Magic university.This is a story about a magical university where the main character is transferring to.

name: Strip Fighter Zero
description: The bawdy spoof filled origin game of the "Strip Fighter" series of 90's style 2D fighting games finally hits the scene! An underground fighting tournament filled with deadly fighters and martial artists. Their fierce battle for supremacy is about to unfold!

name: Trail Hogs
description: The Trail Hogs is a bicycle jousting platform adventure game where you play as a cyclist with bumpers in a fight to reclaim your bicycle kingdom, Hog Haven. You cannot die in this game and it has some unique features. Difficulty is moderate to hard.

name: Mechaneer Resta's Grand Adventure
description: One day, the robots around town lose control and start running amok. It's up to Resta and her good friend Curie to identify the source of the disturbance and save everyone!

name: Exhibitors
description: Deep within the clouds of a gas giant, supermassive creatures occupy the sky, each exhibiting an ecosystem. Exhibitors is a Factory building game with elements of farming and exploration.

name: Pocket City 2
description: Build and explore your own city in this 3D sequel to the original Pocket City! Create using roads, zones, landmarks, and special buildings. Drop your avatar into the world and roam freely. Buy your own house, host events, survive disasters, and live the life of a successful mayor!

name: A Little to the Left: Something Eggstra
description: Sweetening the neatening: four new egg-shaped puzzles to beat this Easter

name: Cool Kid Cody: Season 2 - Episode 01
description: This DLC gives you access to Season 2 Episode 1: Detective Kitten! After a beatdown at the hands of Cody and Peter, now two totally Average dudes, the Greatboard returns to CHS to set things right.

name: Laxius Soul
description: Sin descripción

name: Hook & Kaiju
description:
Maneuver the airship and hook the Kaiju’s body to make it lose balance and fall over. As the newest member of the airship unit, lay siege on the Kaiju and defend the towers at all costs!

The first release from the 2022 New Hire Onboarding Program at Bandai Namco Studios!

name: Path of Exile: Crucible
description:
In Path of Exile: Crucible, you'll learn about the ancient titans who once shaped the primordial surface of Wraeclast. If you're powerful enough, you will earn the ability to forge their power onto your weapons.

Our April expansion introduces the Crucible challenge league, nine new Vaal Skills, Atlas Gateways, over ten new Unique Items and improvements to Breach, Abyss, Passive Tree Masteries, the Saboteur, the Pathfinder, Ruthless and much more!

name: Mega Man 4 Voyage: Blue Version
description: Mega Man 4 Voyage: Blue Version is a rom hack for Mega Man 4, served as an alternative version to Mega Man 4 Voyage developed by MartsINY.

name: MX vs. ATV: Legends - Season One: Exclusive Box Edition
description:
MX vs ATV Legends Season One marks the newest addition to the popular MX vs ATV off-road racing franchise. With this game, players can fulfill their dream of becoming a renowned off-road rider, garnering widespread recognition and admiration from fans and sponsors alike. Whether they choose to play the career or online modes, they'll get to experience the thrill of racing to the finish line on bikes, ATVs, and UTVs. This latest instalment also boasts expansive open environments and a comprehensive career mode, allowing players to immerse themselves fully in the world of professional off-road racing and enjoy all the highs and lows that come with it.
MX vs ATV Legends Season One includes 3 extensive DLCs.

name: Waves Running Simulator
description: Have you seen the enormous waves destroying the planet? If not, you are in the right place! In Waves Running Simulator you have to escape from the tsunami as fast as possible.

name: Getting Freaky With Fujiki
description: In a secluded room of a coworking space, you meet a female student named Fujiki. She talks to you about things in her daily life which you quietly listen to in your room. All while hoping for some peace and quiet. How will your daily life change in your interactions with Fujiki?

name: Mystic Warriors Battleground
description: Mystic Warriors Battleground is an exciting fighting game where players take on the role of a skilled warrior who must battle through challenging levels to defeat their enemies. Along the way, players will develop their abilities and skills, allowing them to customize their fighter to suit their playstyle.

name: Hlina
description:
A dream in a world of plasticine.

hlina is an adventure game released as a part of the 39th edition of the indie virtual zine Indiepocalypse. It will be released as a standalone game in May 2023.

name: Megafortress Collection
description: Take to the skies for gripping air-assault missions with the Megafortress Collection. This complete package includes the original 1991 DOS classic Megafortress, the Operation Sledgehammer and Operation Skymaster expansions, and the Mission Editor for Operation Skymaster.

name: 1001 Jigsaw: Cute Cats 5
description: Soapy cats do not get tired of hilarity! And the brain relentlessly demands a workout - the game "1001 Jigsaw: Cute Cats 5" will help in this!

name: Match Three Pack
description: Two great Match three adventures in one fantastic bundle!

name: Swords & Bones: Premium Edition
description:
Grab the sword and defend the Kingdom of Vestus in an adventure full of action in the spirit of classic retro games.

The Premium Edition includes:
- Over 50 levels full of action
- 16-bit style visuals
- Power-ups to collect
- Cool bosses to defeat
- Atmospheric chiptune music
- Two endings to discover
- 2 DLCs: the Valor and the Spooky Skin.

name: Paze Knight Ellen and the Dungeon Town Sodom
description: Dungeon-- An ancient ruin from the dark era. Monsters came pouring out non-stop, but countless adventurers gathered to get the "treasure" inside. The town nearby thrived. Paze Kingdom Knight Ellen was heading towards a dungeon town called "Sodom".

name: Reflections of Life: Spindle of Fate
description: The world's fate hangs by a thread...

name: Legacy of Epstein: Bad Omen
description: Juglio encounters the Splendor Man... What happens next is unthinkable.

name: Evil is Back
description: "Evil is Back" is a retelling of the movies "Evil Dead 1 and 2"... With everything a low budget short film should have. For fans of 80's trash horror movies.

name: H Girl 2
description: Swap tiles to reveal 5 characters with 20 NSFW images respectively. Relax with easy puzzles or challenge yourself with expert difficulty level. Completed puzzles can be viewed later in the gallery. Swap, match and have love!

name: The Prowler Hell
description: Escape from the devasted land and try to survive.

name: Auto Brawl Chess
description: Auto Brawl Chess is a balanced blend of Auto Chess, Idle RPG, and CCG mechanics given form on an epic battlefield! Build your unique band of heroes, level them up, and set out on a thrilling Journey into the mythical world of Pangea waiting to be saved!

name: Christmasjong
description: Feel the atmosphere of Christmas with Christmasjong, a great Mahjong game with beautiful Chrsitmas theme Mahjong tiles. Customize everything you need! Set the background, the color and shape of tiles and many things more. Choose whatever mode you like: Classic or Match.

name: Greymarsh
description: Explore a bustling city in your quest to kill an evil tyrant in this text-based RPG, where simple RPG battle and inventory management is combined with a branching story in the manner of "choose your own adventure" game books of old.

name: Idle Clans
description: Idle Clans is a multiplayer idle game that combines the classic MMORPG experience with simplified gameplay and less time commitment. Features include a player-driven economy, PvE, trading, quests, crafting and opportunities to play, socialize and collaborate with other players.

name: Hinami Bay
description: Hinami Bay is a casual, mini open-world hentai game. Talk to girls on a private island and train yourself to become smarter and stronger, so have a better chance with the ladies.

name: Hentai SpaceSuit
description: Hentai SpaceSuit is a relaxing puzzle game. With the theme of space suit and 24 unique sexy girls. Enjoy sexy girls pictures and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.

name: Long Truck Simulator
description: Long Truck Simulator is an exciting and challenging game that puts you in the driver's seat of a powerful long-haul truck.

name: Knights and Goblins
description: Knights and Goblins is a deck building card game. Build and play your deck against the computer. Win challenging opponents, get new cards to improve your deck, and design your own unique card. Will you manage to win all rounds and be the new champion?

name: Pactum + Episode 1
description: Explore all the different routes of Pactum! Try to discover more about what really happened. Learn more about each character by picking between some... story-changing choices!

name: My Dear Dad
description: Xiaoqian's father dragged his exhausted body home, only to find that his house was engulfed in flames. In order to save his daughter, he rushed into the scene of fire, but fainted the moment he saw her. When he woke up again, he found himself in a strange place, and his daughter Xiaoqian was missing...

name: Oh! Fuse Box
description: This is a new remake of a puzzle game that connects pipes.

name: Scroter
description: Scroter is a fast-paced physics-based fighting game where you battle it out as bouncing balls collecting powerups to gain an advantage and trick your opponents. Will you get the crown?

name: Darkside
description: An online hacking game with no limits in a multiplayer only world. The objective of the game is to increase your wealth by any means necessary and upgrade your gear but beware, people will rip you apart

name: Catgotchi: Virtual Pet
description: Welcome to Catgotchi: Virtual Pet, the ultimate game for all cat lovers! Raise and care for your virtual pet. These adorable pixel-art cats are sure to steal your heart!

name: Numbers and Squares
description: Solve different Sudoku puzzles and choose from four different difficulties.

name: Resident Evil 4: The Mercenaries
description: The Mercenaries is a long-running Resident Evil challenge mode that sees players attempt to defeat as many enemies as they can before the timer runs out - or you die. In the original Resident Evil 4, Mercenaries mode was unlocked upon completing the main game. This time, it will be a free DLC content post-launch.

name: Super Cute Alien's Adventure
description: A cute platforming adventure for players of all ages!

name: GachaHell
description:
In this breakneck, arcade-style, game, you'll take control of Flow, Macho, and Jade - three idols who were fired from their dream gig for being too... different. But don't count them out just yet - with your help, they'll fight to climb the ranks and become the ultimate 5-star idols!

Choose from three thrilling game modes as you strive to reach the top. But be warned: the competition is fierce and the stakes are high. You'll need to quickly feed weaker idol units to your own to level up and reach a coveted 5-star rating. But if you're not careful, you could end up as level fodder yourself!

The world of this fictional mobile gacha game is not for the faint of heart. It's a cutthroat place where only the highest star idols will survive. Do you have what it takes to lead Flow, Macho, and Jade to their dream in this GachaHell?

name: Tuya
description: The protagonist returns to his parents' house in a hurry after hearing the news of his grandfather's death, and there he meets a terrifying sight!

name: Gangster Life: Criminal Untold , Cars, Theft, Police
description: Gangster Life is the number one game on how to grow from a simple crook into a gangster. Who controls the whole city where you were born and where you will start doing your illegal work. Explore a large detailed city with realistic textures.

name: Genie
description: Explore fantastic environments as Lula, as she journeys to discover the meaning of the Genie and fulfill her destiny.

name: Chief Emoji Officer
description: Chief Emoji Officer recreates the absurdities of tech corporations by letting you become CEO using only emojis. Climb your way through corporate America by getting promoted, making allies, avoiding layoffs, and turning Redify into the most successful company in the world.

name: Strippers
description: Strippers - is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: Don't Byte Your Tongue
description: Don’t Byte Your Tongue is a thrilling 8-bit retrowave platformer where you have to climb up multiple levels and overcome various obstacles to reach your robo-lover at the very top. This rage game/precision platformer will test your skills and patience as one wrong move can send you back to the very bottom. You can choose from different game modes to suit your preference and style. You can also show off your best times and rank up on the cross-platform leaderboard that features players from all over the world.

name: Bottoms Up!: Part 1
description: The most intoxicating story you will ever read... Literally! Bottoms Up! - is a linear Visual Novel type of game that only aims to present compellingly an interesting fantasy world, colorful characters and the largely funny, but sometimes dark shenanigans they get into.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Illustrations
description: Puzzles of beautiful illustrations!

name: Battle of Guardians
description: Forgotten Guardians returned to save humanity from a demonic invasion. Battle of Guardians, is a real-time online multiplayer PVP and PVE free-to-play fighting game.

name: Ashcrown
description: Ashcrown is a turn-based PvP game that’ll test your strategic mettle. Combining the champion-based gameplay of MOBAs with the depth of strategy games like chess, every decision you make will determine if you’ll achieve glorious victory or crushing defeat.

name: 2D Dawg 2
description: A Russian visual novel with anthropomorphic dogs.

name: 1Week
description: 1Week is a PvE sandbox in which you'll live in a post-apocalyptic world of exploration and survival in the underground by looting, building, crafting, farming, and fighting. Be self-sufficient before your week’s supplies run out.

name: Adventures of Skye the Slime Maid
description: Join the cool and sociable MC's RPG medieval-themed, romance-comedy, fantasy visual novel adventures with his magical, beautiful monster girl, slime maid, to become the best Adventurers in the country.

name: Interior Worlds
description: Interior Worlds is an ambient first-person exploration game where you take pictures of liminal spaces.

name: First Light
description: As a Search and Rescue officer, you're no stranger to remote areas. After a freak blizzard strands two people in a remote cabin, you've been sent to help. Play tandem stories of past and present, all while being hunted by a malevolent being of winter and hunger in this story-driven survival horror.

name: Quant
description: Quant is a colorful adventure game, that will teach you Quantum Physics! Follow Atom, in the quest for independence. Guided by Professor Svobodan Randov, he will uncover his Quantum powers, and free himself from the oppressing world!

name: Song of the Prairie
description: Farms, stories, exploration, and DIY are all the content you can experience on this free and magical land. No matter what kind of life you choose, please enjoy the surprises from this land as much as you can!

name: Fruit Ninja VR 2
description: The sequel to the juiciest VR game of all time! Expand your arsenal with the bow, slice your way through unique challenges and explore the scenic Fruit Ninja temple grounds.

name: Lone Fungus
description: A Metroidvania inspired by new & old classics like Hollow Knight, Super Metroid, Super Castlevania IV & Megaman X.

name: EA Sports PGA Tour
description: The exclusive home of the Majors, EA Sports PGA Tour features Pure Strike for superior golf gameplay powered by ShotLink, and unrivaled access to the world’s most exclusive golf courses.

name: City Z
description: Put on your armor, choose a rifle or a shotgun - now you are part of a special forces group. Shoot your way out of a skyscraper full of zombies.

name: Legends of Elumia
description:
Legends of Elumia (Elumia) is a next generation web 3.0 Massively Multiplayer Online RPG (MMORPG). Players can immerse themselves in various gameplay zones, engaging in multiplayer adventures, quests and fierce battles to gain epic loot items.

In the Elumia game world, players have full ownership of their characters and equipment. The governance token Elumia Crowns ($ELU) gives users a voice in the future direction of the game’s development.

name: Buddy Shell
description: Sin descripción

name: Trinity Shells
description: Sin descripción

name: Businessmen
description:
a group of businessman just arrived in delfino square, and they want to make sure they own all the coins around here.

traditional laws of physics don't apply for business.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Hot Sands Escapade
description:
Version 6.5 of Honkai Impact 3rd, marking the beginning of Part 1.5 of the main story, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Valkyrie Quicksand
• New Story Chapter XXXVI: Hailing from Nagazora
• New Featured Event: Meow Town Escapade
• ...and more!

name: The Spiritworld
description: Large episode with 7 main levels + 3 secret levels + custom start map + new end boss, all inspired by Quake 1 episode 4 (Elder World) in a classic-ish id1 style. Supports co-op.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Part 1.5 - Dance of Life and Death
description:
Dance of Life and Death is part 1.5 of HoYoverse's Honkai Impact 3rd. It follows Seele Vollerei and Fu Hua in the aftermath of Project Stigma as a powerful new threat emerges and reveals the fate of a long forgotten Previous Era Project.

Dance of Life and Death spans 7 Main Story Chapters.

name: Knights of Grayfang
description:
The land of Eldraad is in the midst of a war between the humans, born from the Twilight Deity, and the monsters, born from the Nightfall Deity, to control all nine temples. King Edwahl wields twilight's might, turning humans into vampires via a ritual. Yet, a sinister force awakens among monsters. Will nightfall or twilight triumph?
One of the main characters, Thoma, wields a unique Blood Gauge, replacing HP and MP. Using this gauge, characters can activate Bloodthirst, granting new skills and appearances. Equip bats found in dungeons for passive effects like protection from ailments and boosted attack power. Seize victory by claiming all nine temples. Unravel the mysteries and battle the monsters within to conquer them!

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Battle Stage: Fairy's Forest Factory
description: The additional battle stage "Fairy's Forest Factory" becomes selectable in-game.

name: G-Mode Archives 47: 12Gems
description:
The time left is only one night.
Save the world with the power hidden in 12 types of GEM.

"12GEMs" is an RPG that uses the power hidden in 12 types of GEMs (jewels) and travels while summoning partners sealed in each GEM.

The beginning of the story is the aerial castle "Ganseld" floating in the sky with the power of GEM.
The people living in Ganseld chose themselves as noble people, and the lower world on earth was taught as a place where unclean people and horrible monsters wandered around, and they lived without involvement.

However, one day, the GEM that supported Ganseld suddenly scattered to the uncurled ground.
In order to prevent the castle from falling, the main character, the boy "Dino", received the order of collecting GEM and went to the lower world, but it was a mysterious and mysterious world that was different from what was taught in Ganzeldo ...

Until Ganzeld crashed, there was only one night left. The fate of the world was entrusted to a boy.

name: Extreme Volleyball Infernal League
description: Save the world by defeating all your opponents at volleyball! (with special rules) and sending the great demon king back to its world for another millennium!

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character 8: Bedman?
description: Adds Bedman? to the roster of playable characters.

name: Construction Simulator: Year 1 Season Pass
description:
Expand your Construction Simulator experience with the Year 1 Season Pass! It includes 21 brand-new machines, new mission campaigns, two cosmetic packages as DLCs, and a season pass helmet – all in one package.

The Year 1 Season Pass contains:

• Exclusive Season Pass Helmet – available now!
• JCB Pack with 6 brand-new machines
• Cosmetic Pack #1, including two helmets, new safety glasses, and additional ear protection for your avatar
• The Airfield Expansion features a brand-new campaign with airfield-related contracts, adding more than 30 hours of gameplay on both Sunny Haven and Friedenberg
• Cosmetic Pack #2, including new skins for helmets
• The SANY Pack adds 15 new machines from the renowned Chinese manufacturer
• The Spaceport Expansion includes a brand-new map inspired by a tropical peninsula and three exclusive campaigns that add more than 40 hours of gameplay

name: Choro Q
description:
This is a homebrought game, run on Gameboy Color. Original version: Taito - MSX, 1984. Created with GB-Studio 2.0.0 beta5!

The player takes the role of a yellow Volkswagen Beetle (Type 1) Choro-Q, with a surfboard carrier on its roof. The objective of the game is to assemble two more VW Beetles while contending with hostile Choro-Q cars that intend to impede the player's progress. The enemies can be eliminated by jumping on them.

However, the player has a limited amount of life to complete the VW Beetles, which must be assembled in the right order; First, the chassis, then the motor, and lastly the body. When one VW Beetle is completed, it leaves behind a power-up (indicated by a coin-like icon with a dollar sign ($) on it) that grants temporary invincibility, allowing the player to plow through enemy cars.

The level is completed by assembling both VW Beetles. The parts of the Beetles are on the edges of a three-level suspended platform system, and must be pushed off for assembly. The player can jump on the platforms to reach the parts.

The player can lose lives by starting or performing an assembly out of order, crashing into a wall at high speed, falling from too great a height, colliding with an enemy Choro-Q. If the player loses all lives, it results in a game over.

name: Russian Fishing 4: Norwegian Sea
description: Explore the sea and find fish with a powerful marine boat and a fish finder. Use a variety of tackle and bait to achieve the best result. Get new fishing experience and compete with other players.

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Tentacled Terrors Tyrannize Terra!
description: Stop the wild machinations of the Neo-Humanoids!

name: Connect Dots Puzzle: Classic Casual Arcade
description: Connect the dots in classic dot to dot puzzle with gems and fruits!

name: Project Dark
description: Project Dark is a narrative-driven, immersive audio game that draws on the classic “choose your own adventure” genre to create a unique and compelling interactive experience. The game’s impactful choices and its sophisticated binaural audio allow players to become so immersed in the experience that they can play with their eyes closed.

name: Lovely Neko Girl
description: Lovely Neko Girl is a soothing puzzle game that offers players a chance to unwind while solving puzzles. Complete each puzzle while enjoying beautiful pictures of hot girls and relaxing music.

name: Zeus: God of Lightning
description: Discover the legendary story of Zeus in this fun narrative game, as you complete all the missions. You will have to secure the reign, while you travel and rescue your brothers.

name: Beach Cafe II: The Escape Room
description: Grandfather is still missing, after visiting the beach cafe, and delving into his memories, it's time for the next place. Will you unravel the secrets surrounding his disappearance?

name: Arcade Archives: Rezon
description:
Set on Earth during an extraterrestrial invasion, players take control of an SR-91 fighter ship equipped with a VAWS (Variable Armor & Weapon System) and take on the invaders.
Pick up items and equip Arms, a key feature that gives you the ability to attack behind you or block enemy shots when used well.

name: Sentinels of Earth-Prime
description: Control a new team of heroes battling evil villains across dynamic environments. Play out epic comic book battles come to life in this exciting adaptation of the hit card game.

name: Evil of Demons: Algailah
description:
Evil of Demons: Algailah is a survival horror game, hiding and escaping, where the hero is kidnapped by a demon at noon the hero wakes up and finds himself somewhere underground, tries to get out of the predicament by finding keys and collecting the statues to open the exit door, you must have to hide from the devil and sneak away from him so that he can survive. Along the way there will be obstacles and places to hide.
While you try to escape from the demon home you will explore the fearsome cellar of the Demon
Reveal some facts.

name: Boomerang Battles
description: Boomerang Battles is a fast paced action roguelike where you battle your way through 100 floors of a deadly dungeon with your trusty boomerang in a bid for your freedom. Pick your favourite boomerang, learn its attack patterns, find upgrades, and battle against exciting bosses. Escape if you can.

name: Hentai Melody
description: What could be more beautiful than hentai?

name: Multiplayer Shooter FPS
description: Multiplayer Shooter FPS is an advanced multiplayer first-person shooter game.

name: Rescue Agency: The Kidnapper of Happiness
description: Rescue Agency combines the best elements of strategy and farming with storytelling and exciting missions. This is a secret, unknown world of adventure and magic! You have to go to the mysterious country to save its inhabitants from the insidious Kidnapper of Happiness.

name: Shooting Saucer
description: A flying saucer chases you all over the galaxy. Run away, defeat enemies, and evolve to avoid getting abducted

name: The Dungeon Vendor
description: Travel to dungeons. Meet new heroes. Craft new weapons. Collect the loot. You are The Dungeon Vendor. The world has become a dark place and heroes are answering the call. It is time for you to help them by creating powerful weapons… for a tidy profit of course.

name: Necogram
description: Necogram is a classical nonogram puzzle game in the company of beautiful neko-women

name: Half-Life 2: VR Mod - Episode Two
description: Prepare for unforeseen consequences as you traverse the White Forest and battle the Combine forces as Gordon Freeman in this community-made adaptation of Episode Two to glorious roomscale Virtual Reality!

name: NetMaze: A Funnyman Game
description:
netMaze allows you and up to 15 other players to explore different parts of Cyberspace together through the high-octane competitive Brawl mode or the creative Sandbox mode.

Take the maze by storm or build out your own virtual world using your very own Funnyman, a digital avatar that you can customize to your liking with different colors, weapons, and more!

name: Anima Reprise
description: It has been one hundred years. One hundred years since you were captured and a plot (or rather a sickly joke) to take over the universe and overthrow the king was enacted. Now the world is run by literal clowns, and you must overthrow the overthrowee, and take back the honor of the king.

name: Across the Valley
description: Across the Valley is your friendly VR farm, developed exclusively for virtual reality, where you really lend a hand. Instead of clicking around in menus, you care for the animals and plants with your own hands. Instead of looking at the farm from up above, you yourself can relax in this hand-drawn paradise.

name: The Wayhaven Chronicles: Book Three
description: Your decisions will shape who is friend or foe, who will share in your secrets, and just how your romance with a certain vampire will grow!

name: Look Find Find
description: "Look Find Find" is a cartoon style casual game. Players need to find the corresponding props in the scene according to the prompts.

name: Oxygen
description: Oxygen is a survival city builder. Build your city around the Oxygen Center and ensure your people's survival in a post-apocalyptic future, threatened by crack explosions, deadly winds, droughts and frosts. Lead your people and more importantly keep the Oxygen Center running!

name: Higan: Eruthyll
description: Higan: Eruthyll is a 3D real-time combat RPG that brings fantasy to theater. Planet Eruthyll is where you can use diverse tactics with dynamic instructions and enjoy the touching stories presented by fantastic cutscenes.

name: ToriDori
description:
Immerse yourself in a low poly world at the turn of time.
Look for differences in the adjacent timeline to unlock the continuation of the story.

name: Blocky Dungeon
description: A weird mix of block-placing puzzle and roguelike, where you build a dungeon and explore it at the same time! Defeat enemies, clear lines and collect loot. Explore the different dungeons, complete quests and try to survive as long as you can!

name: The Library of Babel
description: Join Ludovik in a 2D Stealth Platformer and Graphic Adventure, as he explores the jungles of a futuristic Babylon to discover the secret behind the Library of Babel’s sudden lockdown and the mysteries behind their mythical creators.

name: Gemini
description: A Journey of Two Stars.

name: Thief Simulator: Luxury Houses
description: To access this content you need to have the game Thief Simulator on Steam.

name: Kujlevka
description: A flying saucer crash-lands in a distant Russian village, turning a rundown kolkhoz into the first, thin bridge between civilizations. As the first point of contact, you must dictate how this encounter unfolds and ultimately determine history’s outcome.

name: HyperViolent
description: An ancient evil has awoken in the depths of a remote mining asteroid, stirred from its slumber by man's lust for power. Unaware, you answer a distress call and become stranded, surrounded by monstrous foes. Unravel the mystery of this madness and stop its spread in this violent retro shooter!

name: Supplice
description: Supplice is a stylish throwback shooter inspired by the mid-90s FPS glory days and the legendary Doom modding community. Mixing the retro stylings of 90s era shooters with colorful graphics and frantic gameplay, it creates an experience that's ever so familiar but also exciting and fresh.

name: The Unbeatable Path
description: The Unbeatable Path is a realistic and immersive first-person horror adventure in which you'll have to solve puzzles and riddles in a hellish environment. In the process, you'll uncover Mia's story and find out why she finally took her own life. Will you change her story for the better?

name: Everspace 2
description:
Everspace 2 is a fast-paced single-player spaceship shooter with exploration in space and on planets, tons of loot, RPG elements, mining, and crafting. Experience an exciting sci-fi story set in a vivid, handcrafted open world full of secrets, puzzles, and perils.

After an early access period of just over 2 years, Everspace 2 launched its full 1.0 release on PC in April of 2023, later coming to Xbox Series X|S and PS5 in August of 2023.

name: Curse of the Sea Rats
description: Embark on an epic, hand-animated, ‘ratoidvania’ adventure, where your crew has been turned into rats by a pirate witch! Explore a rich non-linear world, enjoy fun action platforming, face challenging bosses, and unlock unique abilities - either alone or in local co-op!

name: Melon Journey: Bittersweet Memories
description:
Melon Journey: Bittersweet Memories is a story-exploration game about revisiting a town full of adorable animals with eccentric personalities. Yet under its cute and nostalgic surface lies a dark tale of crime and corruption...

Play as Honeydew, an employee of a huge melon factory, and travel to Hog Town where melons are illegal. While searching for a missing friend, you'll have to explore the town and its surrounding areas, and speak with suspicious characters in dangerous situations to uncover the truth.

name: Apex Racer
description: APEX Racer strives to deliver the most authentic representation of the tuning culture. Dozens of cars and hundreds of parts available for you to plan and build your ultimate ride. Trick out your project car with our robust tuning system, express yourself and make your car shine. New parts are always being added, so there's always a bit of something for everyone!

name: Sudoku
description: Train and release your stress with sudoku for iOS devices.

name: Repeat the Ending
description: Explore an all-new "critical edition" of a 1996 Inform 5 game about mental illness, magic, and the second law of thermodynamics.

name: Ugly Button Adventure
description: The Ugly Button Adventure is a classic example of point and click and escape room adventure games that are loved by many gamers around the world. Players will have to solve puzzles and interact with different objects in the game to progress and escape from the unknown room. If you are a fan of escape room games, then Ugly Button Adventure will be right up your alley. It has all the elements that make escape rooms so thrilling, such as hidden clues, puzzles, and a sense of urgency to escape.

name: Fazbear Fright Attraction
description: Fazbear's Fright Attraction, otherwise known as FNaF 3: PLUS by fans is an indie point-and-click fangame developed by LostPawPlay, taking inspiration from Phisnom's cancelled project Five Nights at Freddy's Plus to create a sequel based around his original recreation of Phisom's works, FNaF Plus Restored. Like his initial release, Fazbear's Fright Attraction is an alternative take on Scott Cawthon's Five Nights at Freddy's 3.

name: Celeste Classic
description:
An unofficial port of Celeste Classic from PICO-8 to Playdate. Celeste Classic on Playdate was made to be as faithful as possible to the original game on PICO-8. But here are a few notable changes:

The game is in black and white only. A lot of visual elements have an outline to make them more readable. But this does not impact their original hitbox.

The game is rendered at 256×240 from the original 128×128. Four pixel lines are cropped at the top and bottom of the screen. The game can be played at its original resolution by disabling the Fullscreen option available in the game’s menu.

Assist mode is available under the game’s menu. This allows players to skip a level, change the game speed to 0.5×, get infinite dashes, and enable invincibility. If assist mode is used during a run, a mention is added on each level in the lower right corner, as well as in the pause screen and the final score screen.

name: Limit Buffet
description: Limit Buffet is a 39-map limit-removing community megawad made of maps and songs which each adhere to their own strict limitations. Perhaps you’ve seen wads based on such mapping limitations: using only 100 linedefs, 64 vertices, or 30 monsters for example. Limit Buffet samples a variety of these ideas, some traditional, some zany. We’ve even got a full soundtrack in this spirit!

name: Arrokoth
description: Dark and Moody vanilla-compatible E1 replacement for The Ultimate Doom.

name: Try to Fit
description: Sin descripción

name: Traveler's Game
description:
You are Camus Chen. Yesterday you received a video mail from your friend Lu. He thinks you have too few friends and recommends you a popular game:
『This is a battle game but many people use it as a chat room』
Lu told you so.

You decided to join your friends in this game to meet new opponents and chat with them while playing against them. Lu wants you to chill.

But what you didn't expect is that some of your opponents will have a connection to your life in the future. One of them will even learn the great secret behind you and your friends...

name: Emerald Wasp
description:
Operation Rassvet was a model of surprise.

It started as an intelligence operation and ended up becoming one of the most mysterious disappearences to these days. None of the members were found. Forgotten by the world, the last survivor is hiding in the shadows...

name: Tetris E60
description: Tetris E60 is web game released to promote the movie Tetris. It emulates the look of the original Tetris prototype for the Electronika 60 by Alexey Pajitnov.

name: Infernax: Deux or Die
description:
The update will bring a new playable character into the fray: Cervul the Squire, a well-rounded lad who sports deadly talents in both axe throwing and tool-assisted combat.

It also incorporates co-op play in Infernax‘s fan-favorite gun mode, perfect for players keen on wielding maximum firepower against the game’s monstrous beasts.
